title: Instant Heart Rate: HR Monitor & Pulse Checker
description:
Most accurate and easy-to-use heart rate app
- Get your heart rate in less than 10 seconds
- Check your stress levels
- See trends and insights
- Used in heart research at UCSF!

Instant Heart Rate is the most accurate heart rate monitor. Trusted by top research institutions such as UCSF for cardiology research training, and used in UCSF Health eHeart Study for its accuracy.

Measure accurately your pulse and heart beat zone with your heart rate & health monitor after sleeping or during workouts & training. Instant Heart Rate doesn't require heart rate straps. Monitor blood circulation with accurate heart health monitor (similar to ECG or EKG). Functions similarly to pulse oximeters, detecting change in your finger to provide accurate heart beat measurements.

‚ù§ Measure your heartbeat, BPM, ‚ù§, or pulse zone accurately in <10 seconds
‚ù§ PPG graph (similar to ECG / EKG / Cardiograph) - see every heart beat and BPM
‚ù§ Cardio workout monitoring to optimize exercise and track progress pre- and post-workout. Use HR as cardiovascular measurement.
‚ù§ Heart rate training zones (Rest, Fat Burn, Cardio, and Peak)
‚ù§ Google Fit support (heart rate and heartbeat data)
‚ù§ No heart rate or heartbeat straps
‚ù§ Share heart beat

How to use Instant Heart Rate, heartbeat counter, to measure your heartbeat accurately?
Place finger on phone‚Äôs camera to show resting heart rate.
Blood circulation to your finger tip may be altered if press hard on camera lens.

How often should you use Instant Heart Rate?
For accurate measurement, Instant Heart Rate should be used daily to measure heartbeat or pulse. Recommended to tag your heart rate after sleeping or during workouts to separate resting heart rate from workout heart rate.

What is a normal heart rate or heartbeat?
According to American Heart Association (AHA) and the Mayo Clinic, a normal resting heart beat ranges from 60 to 100 beats per minute (BPM). Heart rate can be affected by stress, anxiety, depression, emotions, activity level, fitness level, body composition, and medication use. Knowing heart rate is important heart-health gauge and cardiovascular metric. Heart rate variability is important in measuring stress on your body.

DISCLAIMER
- Instant Heart Rate is for entertainment purposes. Consult your doctor or primary care physician if you require first aid, have a medical emergency, heart attack, or cardiac event (when CPR required).
- Resting heart rate detection not intended to be used as a medical device or as stethoscope.
- Resting pulse oximeter not intended for heart disease or condition diagnosis (afib, heart murmur)
- Heart beat detection does not detect blood pressure or bloodpressure.
- Resting heart beat not intended for baby heart rate. Use others specific for baby heart beat.
- Heart rate monitor may cause hot LED flash.

recentChanges: Performance and stability improvements
comments: Used on S10+. The flash light became so hot it started hurting my finger. I turned on the flash without the app and it was fine. I think it increases the intensity of the light to max and it gets scorching hot. Did not have this problem when I used it in my S8+.
I cannt even finish test because of very high temperature of camera light. Almost burned my finger. Om Samsung 10s.sorry something wrong with your software. And dangerous.
Latest update causing weird issues. Needs fixing.

I used to rate this app a 5star, but then they got rid of continuous monitoring and anytime my finger moved a bit I had to start it up again. I use this app to help with my anxiety, but now these ads pop up and I have to wait before I can use it again. Absolutely the worst thing to happen during a panic attack! So sadly, after many years of use, I'm going to have to uninstall and find an alternative.

this app I've got to say is pretty accurate.. the reason I say that is because I have a medical device that check's your heart rate and oxygen level..now and then I check my heart rate with my cell phone with the heart rate app and compare this app showing my heart rate with my medical device,,which goes over your index finger and there is only 1 or 2 point difference everytime that's pretty good. works good but don't substitute this app from anything you might be using now tommy g So,Cal,

title: Heart Rate Monitor
description:
Heart rate or heartbeat is an important measure in health and fitness. Using Heart Rate Monitor app, you can measure and monitor your heart rate!


‚òÖ Free with unlimited recording
‚òÖ Easy to use with an intuitive design
‚òÖ Identifies heart rate training zones
‚òÖ Google Fit support
‚òÖ No additional hardware required

How to use the heart rate monitor free app to measure your heartbeat?

To use this heart rate monitor app, just put your finger on the phone's camera and stay still, the heart rate should be shown after several seconds.

What is a normal heart rate or heartbeat?

According to Mayo Clinic, a normal resting heartbeat rate for adults ranges from 60 to 100 beats per minute (BPM). However, keep in mind that many factors can influence the heart rate, including Activity level, Fitness level,  Body size, Emotion, etc. Generally, but not always, a lower heartbeat at rest implies more efficient heart function and better cardiovascular fitness.

Consult your doctor if your resting heartbeat is consistently above 100 beats per minute or if you're not a trained athlete and your resting heartbeat is below 60 beats a minute.

What are heart rate training zones?

Heart rate training zones are calculated using maximum heart Rate (MaxHR). Within each training zone, subtle physiological effects take place to enhance your fitness. We have a similar definition to those used in Fitbit trackers:

- REST ZONE (up to 50% HRmax): This considers as resting zone.

- FAT BURN ZONE (50 to 70% of maximum): Recovery and warming up exercises should be completed in this zone. It‚Äôs called the fat burn zone because a higher percentage of calories are burnt from fat.

- CARDIO ZONE (70% to 85% of HRmax): Most of the main exercise should be completed in this zone.

- PEAK ZONE (greater than 85% of HRmax): This zone is ideal for short intense sessions (high-intensity interval training HIIT) to improve performance and speed.

This heart rate monitor app calculates and automatically saves your heart rate training zones.


WARNNING

- Heart rate monitor app should not be used as a medical device.
- If you have a medical condition or worried about your heart condition please always consult your GP.
- In some devices, the heart rate monitor app may make the LED flash very hot.

- Ability to save your heart traces/waves, please go to settings to disable/enable it.

comments: Quite good but I'm not sure about the accuracy. I use it to record my pulse after exercise but it takes about half the scanning time to settle down and then I see it reducing until it's finished the scan. The final scan value is the one that's recorded so I suppose I need a fitness watch if I want a more accurate reading straight after exercise.

So far so good. I had one descrepencie out of 10. The reading was off. My accuracy is important. I hit my highest weight ever at 330 - 5' 10.5¬∞. I'm on a Pro-Form Stepper and it is amazing the results in 15 minute workouts. So today was my first to complete 15 min 6 1/5 laps without a pause. Walking to my bed edge and measure my rate. 128 bpm. My resting is 61 avg. So I'm trusting my health these numbers are accurate. My wife readings are higher which is also accurate.
After the latest update, I'm always on 56, no matter if I'm running, laying, sitting. Just doesn't matter. I want the previous version back !!
Close but not 100%. I work in Healthcare and have access to multiple devices. Direct comparisons and this is usually within 3-10%. Works fine for monitoring when I'm not at work.
Overall it's quite helpful, with some occasional inconsistency. Measurements are a tad low, but close enough for a quick calculation to get the real reading.

title: Cardiograph - Heart Rate Meter
description:
Cardiograph is an application which measures your heart rate. You can save your results for future reference and keep track of multiple people with individual profiles.

Cardiograph uses your device's built-in camera or dedicated sensor to calculate your heart's rhythm - the same approach used by professional medical equipment!

‚úì Measure your heart rate

It's never been easier to know what your heart rate is! Without any external hardware, just using the built-in camera/sensor of your smartphone or tablet, you can get accurate readings almost instantly.

‚úì Know how fast your heart is beating

It can be very useful while exercising, if you're under stress, if you have a heart-related medical condition, or even just out of curiosity.

‚úì Track your results

Every measurement you take is saved to your personal history, so you can keep track over time. 

‚úì Multiple profiles

Cardiograph is perfectly tailored to allow multiple people to use the app on a shared device. You can create profiles for each of your family members or friends, and each of them has their own individual measurement history.

‚úì Clean and intuitive design

The streamlined and clutter-free design makes it seem instantly familiar, so you can focus on using the app instead of navigating through series of screens.

‚úì Android Wear support

Cardiograph is specifically designed with Android Wear support. You can measure your pulse using the hear rate sensor in your smartwatch. Please note that Cardiograph will work on smartwatches with a heart rate sensor only.


Please note: If your device doesn't have a built-in camera flash, you need to take your measurements in a well lit environment (bright sunlight or close to a light source).


Get in touch with us and follow the latest news regarding our apps:
http://www.facebook.com/macropinch
http://twitter.com/macropinch

recentChanges:
* Added support for Android 10

comments: IMO this app is head and shoulders above the rest in this category. It is extremely simple to use, very accurate and records and stores results, giving me something very meaningful to show my cardiologist. One addition I'd like to see is a small text field to allow a recording to be annotated with activity information to add important context.

This app has picked up on irregularities well. And is accurate in detecting rate. But I really wish there was a way to make a note to say what was going on when I used it at that particular time. Something other than "resting", "warm up" etc. Sometimes I get palpitations and will check my rate. Would be nice to be able to add a note like "palpitations while cooking dinner". Then I can fill my doctor in when I see him next.

Best! Ive used many... I suffer from mental and physical health issues. When my anxiety shoots up, I have to do breathing exercises, and I have to monitor my heart rate. So I know what, and when things are happ. This app really is incredible that works immidiate, and you can print/Share out your own cardiograph!!! That is huge for me I mean huge! You can go back to different dates, whatever you want to do if you're looking for something to monitor your heart rate I absolutely recommend this!

clean and simple. this type of app measure bpm by colour change noted by camera. you can see how fast your heart beat by covering camera with finger and make sure flashlight on and light goes throught finger. open video camera with flashlight on. you will see slightly color change on screen with heartbeats!
This does not use the flash on my phone and does not seem to take reliable measurements as compared with other similar apps. Great interface but more work needed.

title: Heart Rate Monitor
description:
Measure, record and track your heart rate easily 
    1. You can measure heart rate (HR).
    2. You can turn off hot flashlight. (top-right flashlight icon)

 It‚Äôs all free 
    1. Unlimited measurements. 
    2. Free additional features. (e.g., csv export, heartrate zone)

 Support heartrate zone calculation 
    1. Target heart rate is important for the best workout and exercise results
    2. Support 5 heart rate zones (i.e., extreme/peak, cardio, fat burn, warm up, resting)
    3. Useful for interval training, CrossFit, cycling, running and weight control.

Beautiful UIs
    1. Statistic UI with graphs. (e.g., min/max/avg)
    2. Interactive UI for heart rate zone.

 Support auto backup (> Android 6.0) and free csv export

* Our app uses your phone's camera to check bpm. Just gently cover your fingertip on the back camera lens and stay still, then your heart beat will be counted after a few seconds. When you turn off flashlight, please measure in sunlight or bright region.

recentChanges: Thank you for using "Accurate Heart Rate Monitor" all the time. We regularly update the app on Google Play so that you can use it comfortably.
comments: Gets my heart rate correct and I'm able to write down how I'm feeling, what time it is, and what I was doing before I took my heart rate. Amazing app, love it. If I had to change one thing about it though I would put advice like if your heart rate is high do this... is your heart rate is low do this... but I love the app, thank you.

Perhaps you've heard of the type of experiment wherein sound is reproduced by analyzing the vibrations of a bag of potato chips through a window in a silent video; that's basically why I accept that this app can work, and work well. It's in the ballpark of what a Polar H10 chest strap is telling me, and the live readout seems to correspond with what I'm feeling. I'd rate it five stars if I could save the line graph as an image. I'll change the rating if I figure it out. Good app, all told.

Great app. I actually compared its Heart Rate results with a expensive BP Monitor that I have, and I was surprised to see that the Heart Rate reading was very close to the one my expensive BP monitor gave me. I recommend this app. It's a very handy thing to have on your phone when your away from home and can't take your reading with your regular medical monitor.

I have a issue that specialists and doctors are finding hard to workout. This app just showed it occurring. So it does catch what heart is doing. Its not meant to diagnois but atleast you can save it and take to a professional for assessment.

Not sure if the app isnt very good, or if I have a heart problem, because the app was giving me drastically different results back to back, and very up and down during test. I was consistent with testing method. Good reviews though so I'll have to test more.

developerAddress: 48 Nguyen Khanh Toan, Cau Giay, Hanoi, Vietnam
recentChanges:
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Android Wear: support standalone mode for automatically heart rate monitor (turn on in Settings), new History tab swipe left to view. Now you can leave your phone at home, do exercise with your watch and then sync it back later (by open watch History tab).

comments: This Is a very accurate app and all I had to do was download it then put my finger over the camera. It then compiles it and plots it out on a scale for your records. I'll be able to show this to my cardiologist which will help w my diagnosis and treatment.

I have POTS where my heart rate is highly elevated for no reason when I'm standing. I've been using this since my symptoms started a year ago and it's been perfect for determining when I need my medication. If I could give 20 stars I would. Thanks for the great app!
If it hadn't been for an initial glitch in recording the readings, I would have given 5 stars. Picks up heart rate quickly and gives good visual representation.
When it works it's good, but often it is difficult to get a reading. Cleaning lens etc. Is done before each try.
There is a problem with this app is that my finger burns as the light from the camera is too intense.

title: Welltory: EKG Heart Rate Monitor & Stress Test
description:
Measure Stress, Energy, & Resilience with a smart, feature-filled Heart Rate app. Loved by 2 million users, featured by TechCrunch, Product Hunt, & Lifehacker.

‚ù§Ô∏è HEART MEASUREMENTS
‚Äì Best heart rate monitoring & diagnostics available
‚Äì Heart rate variability results with 33 stats, personalized and explained in detail
‚Äì Measure by applying finger to your phone‚Äôs camera

ü§ç SMART BLOOD PRESSURE TRACKING
‚Äì Connect a bp monitor for easy everyday tracking and analysis
‚Äì Insights for each reading with 8 scientific metrics and heart rate variability measurements

‚öôÔ∏è SYNC GADGETS
‚Äì 120+ data sources to connect for day to day monitoring
‚Äì Wearables & trackers like FitBit, Garmin, MiFit, Polar, Oura, Withings
‚Äì Apps for fitness, sleep, productivity, meditation, sleep, nutrition, smart events: Runkeeper, RescueTime, GeoSci, DarkSky, SleepCycle, Lifesum, Noom, Flo, IFTTT

‚õπÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è AI WORKOUT COACH
‚Äì Track your performance, avoid overtraining, & recover right
‚Äì Adaptive cardiozones
‚Äì Compare the impact of your workouts

üî¨ ALL-IN-ONE HEALTH APP
‚Äì 30+ tests on cognitive abilities, mental health, ‚Ä®personality ‚Äî all clinical grade
‚Äì For poor measurement results, health alerts will notify when it‚Äôs necessary to see the doctor
‚Äì Recommendations on coping with chronic stress, panic attacks, & insomnia
‚Äì Trends and correlations on a personal dashboard
‚Äì Daily reports to sum up the day

üôè TESTED BY 2 MILLION
1. Men's Health Magazine, 27/01/2020:
"Work Stress Could Be Killing Your Gains. Is work, not working out, the cause of gym burnout?

Keeping tabs on both mental and physical toll is crucial. The solution is heart-rate variability training. You can measure how well you‚Äôve recovered from your last session. High variability signals that you‚Äôre ready to push, low variability means a day of stretching and high-nutrient food. 

If you want to make your training plan stick, track HRV at home with Welltory. Best for beginners, the free version uses your phone‚Äôs camera to measure your HRV. The data is easy to read, giving scores for mood, energy and stress. You won‚Äôt miss a beat."

comments: I was thinking I was just going to get heart BPM but there was so much more. It was amazingly accurate about stress levels, lack of sleep , concentration.... WOW ! You would be doing yourself a great favor by downloading this app. P.S. To the people complaining about the high price for pro version. They offer an amazing amount for what you'd be paying for. I cant afford it either but I'd gladly pay that if I had it. Even the free app gives you a lot with no annoying ads. Either way you win :)

Would have been a 4/5 before they updated the app. I feel ripped off. I paid for this after the free trial and was even recommending it to friends. Then after a little more than a month, the big update happens. I don't know who or what thought that was a good idea, but they need to try using the mess they made. What is the point? It's just an unintuitive, annoying, unattractive interface. I've completely stopped using it when I used to use it daily. Hit the rollback button quick!

Overall, it's been a great tool for tracking exercise recovery and energy levels. Sometimes the app is a little finicky and getting a good measurement with the camera can be tough. But once you figure out those things, it works pretty well. The update is sending me constant notifications to take a measurement, even when I just took one. I have updated the notification settings and still get them throughout the day. It's pretty annoying. I'm really glad that in the update all the extra questions are gone after finishing a measurement.

This is an edit. Originally gave it 4 stars for all tge info it brought. The big update they were promising ruined the app completely. Data is not coming in, or coming in under wrong dates and times, I have metrics I don't understand and their recommendations would be great if they actually came in time. But if I get a recommendation to meditate 24 hours later that will not help me.. Happy I stopped the recurring payment on my pro, I don't feel it's worth the money.

I didnt care for the recent upgrade, it looks like a game developer did this. I'm just interested in the data not all the flash. It's cluttered and not intuitive to use. But you might get used to it after awhile, but like this its not worth the 60 bucks a year to me, I cancelled my subscription.

title: Heart Radio App
description:
With the new Heart App powered by Global Player we've made it easier than ever to turn up the feel good! 

- Listen to Heart in HD quality, live and on the move.
- Catch up / listen again to all your favourite shows whenever you like.
- Download and listen to shows offline, perfect for listening while you're travelling.
- Listen to Heart 70s, 80s, 90s and Dance
- Take control - My Heart 80s, a world-first that allows you to skip songs on live radio - it's radio you control.*
- Subscribe to your favourite shows to automatically download them each day.
- Check the playlist for music info and show schedules to see what's coming up next.
- Discover hundreds of award-winning audio shows in our new Podcasts section. 
- Get the latest artist news and features.

With the Heart app you can also enjoy all of Global's other stations: Capital, Capital XTRA, Gold, LBC, Radio X, Classic FM and Smooth.
 
So, whatever you're into - the latest hits, classic tracks, music for chilling out or even topical debate - Global's got you covered. And best of all, it's completely free and available worldwide. With the Global Player, you can:
 
- Hear the best shows from the biggest names in radio: Amanda Holden, Rochelle Humes, Chris Moyles, Johnny Vaughan, Roman Kemp, Nick Ferrari, Myleene Klass and many more.
- Listen to all of Global's stations in HD audio.
- Get the latest news, videos and pictures from each of Global's stations with the best guests and most entertaining, informative content.
- If you want to relax or exercise, choose Playlists and we'll serve you the best music for your mood.
  
*Currently only available in the UK.

comments: Sleep timer has suddenly developed a mind of its own. If you change it, it just changes back to whatever value it wants. Now it just shuts down through the night. What's happened to the app. The app system button brings up the limited options which aren't rocket science to understand and it isn't user error. Just want to know what's turning the music off during the night? My router doesn't have any timers set. Help...
Great for out doors while walking my dog , or even shopping .
Great for listening to music while out shopping

Love the app, but there is no way to properly exit it. You need to exit in the normal way, then swipe away the app from the lock screen and then delete it from the app history screen, otherwise the heart icon just stays in the status bar. Otherwise it would be 5 stars.

I love this app, however when I choose to take control of the music and change songs, it works fine at first but then suddenly just stops. I'm not sure if this is meant to be happening or if there is a problem...

title: Selfie Heart Rate Monitor - FaceBeat
description:
How it works
Many small blood vessels on the surface of the skin tapers slightly and expands due to a heartbeat, slightly changing the color of the skin. The human eye does not distinguish between these changes, but the cameras of most smartphones are sensitive enough to detect microscopic changes in blood pressure. By tracking facial color fluctuations, our application can evaluate your heart rate.

Unique features:
‚Ä¢ Facial heart rate
‚Ä¢ Measuring heart rate on your finger WITHOUT A FLASH - now you can measure your hr without too much attention from others

NOT A MEDICAL PRODUCT. This application cannot be used to make decisions about health or treatment. If you have heart or pressure problems, please consult your doctor.

I like knowing what my heart rate is. This way after exercising I'll know more or less how long I should rest.

Cool app but if you can make detection through flash like samsung health app, its very accurate, also pls add heart pulse recorder in form of ecg, i get skipped beats and want to discuss with doctor in the future, my problem is they dont happen when tested at hospital so i need to record on app when i feel them, ty
I have used other apps similarly but had cliches.. This app doesn't and seems constant with heart rate test done by a medical Dr and their machine.
Not bad, but need but to be approved by medical practitioners!

title: Kids Heart Challenge
description:
Do your fundraising on the go with your American Heart Association's Kids Heart Challenge app application. Update your page, send emails, and check your progress ‚Äì all from the palm of your hand. The mobile app is a great tool to track your fundraising progress.

Please note: Changes are released occasionally and it‚Äôs important to check your app updates and make sure you are using the latest version.

recentChanges: FY21 AR Updates
comments: It is a good game but the ar feature is not working.

For the most part, I think it's a good app. I think it needs to be easier to update that you have participated that day. Currently, the only way I have been able to reach that is by entering the app, viewing the web page, logging into HQ, editing the profile and then from there going to the events page. There has got to be a easier and less time consuming route to do that. Additionally, selecting that you have participated should be based on the calendar day (date) instead of on a 24 hour cycle.

It may be convenient if you are trying to easily raise money, but honestly the website works well enough for that. My issue with the app is that they get the kids all excited about making their stickers and heart heroes come to life with the augmented reality part of the app. Then it turns out that not all phones are compatible with that feature. I downloaded the app last year because she was desperate to use that feature. It worked last year. Now this year it says my device (same phone) is not compatible. Not all of us get new phones every year or 2. It really shouldn't be so complicated that a 2 year old phone can't work with the feature.

Agree with the others saying the camera won't work for the arcade. Keeps saying my phone is not compatible. It's frustrating that my kids can't complete the Finn Challenge because we don't own an iphone. I know that education and raising money is the main goal here, but let's face it, earning those prizes in the process is everything to 5-7 year olds! Please fix this!

Love the app. Makes things very easy. Have been trying for 3 days to scan the heart healthy logo and it will not do anything. I've clicked on the blue and black camera and I've turned the phone parallel as other reviews recommended nothing has worked. It's all my daughter has left to earn Finn.

comments: I have been playing this game for 40yrs, long before it was a computer game, with real cards and players. Never lost so much, almost every hand I take the queen of spades. It seems as though I am playing against the pack and not the players. E.g lay a 3 of diamonds and suddenly only one player has diamonds and lays the 2, I get the queen spades . If I go for a full house with only 1 or 2 high hearts the next player will have an ace and take it first time hearts are out ,then play to my hand?

So not sure if I'm the only one that has this problem, BUT every few games the ads in between games are like zoomed in to where I cant press the 'X' or 'Close' and then have to get booted from the game because I can't get back to it. It's fine with the single player game as I can just close the game and come back. But thats not possible with online play.

Too many ads, too many opportunities for opponents to slow down and ruin a game. Some ads still have close button in top left corner which don't work and cause me to get booted. There needs to be a TIMER on each player's turn. A visible, 10 second count down and if they don't play a card one is automatically played or they get booted. It sucks that half the games people either quit or get salty and just take 20 seconds every turn until I quit and then get banned for quitting. Good game otherwise

Very good version of Hearts. You can play against real people or against AIs. Games finish at 50 points, so most rounds go quickly. What I don't like: a lot of people quit part way through the round when things aren't going their way and you have to wait for their turn to time out. Also, there are a few "comments" you can make during your round (good luck, nice one, etc) that some people annoyingly misuse. I wish there was an option to block certain players to limit interaction with these folks.

Game may be good, but it forced me to watch 8+ ads just to play ONE FREAKING GAME of soltaire Hearts. I understand they need to make $, but this is ridiculous!! Every single hand, another ad. Wanna go back to main menu after a game? Guess what?? YEP!!! ANOTHER ad. You honestly spend more time watching ads then playing the actual game! Only way to get rid of ads is to pay $20. Sorry, but my experience after just one game was so overwhelmingly ad focused, i just couldn't take it anymore!

comments: This is the worst app ever, every game is rigged by admin, dealer, and if you say this, admin says it Is a random deal , generated by the computer, not possible, I got to four crowns, twice, and every non passing hand I got, queen and eight of spades, not very likely In five consecutive days of playing!!! They warn everyone not to mention USA politics or get a ban,, I am not in America, didnt mention it and have been banned for 2 days!! Idiots! ,!!
Too much cheating Have someone in charge of the table Let them boot the cheater off Do not let partners play together If you stop.the cheaters You will have a better.game

It's decent but easy to beat as it's predictable. I played over 2k games, set at 21 hands, and won 84% of them also getting 42% of "shoot the moon" hands. The game mostly throws under and sometimes holds higher cards to stop StMs. Still though it's pretty fun. And no, I never once used the "Undo used" feature except hitting it accidentally trying to use the "Eye" icon to view previous trick.

Full screen ads appearing after completing game are now unable to stop before a prescribed amount of time or unless you exit the hearts app. These animated ads (which further drain battery) were tolerable when you could simply press the back button and return to the hearts app to start a new game. Now, the back button is disabled, even preventing you from returning to another application or homepage, again, unless you close app completely. The enjoyment of the game has been greatly diminished.

Basically this isn't a real hearts game. Reason being the creators of the game made a point system for some idiotic reason. So instead of going for low man like you would normally do people play for 2nd place since you still get positive points. Why they thought that would be a good idea is beyond me. So you can get 5 crowns and never come in first place. And get rid of the button that lets you look at previous cards played. It takes skill to actually count cards and know what's still out there.

title: Hearts Card Classic
description: Improve your skills and become a Hearts pro! Hearts Card Classic has three different difficulty settings so you can work your way up to playing like a pro. Statistics are kept for wins and losses and moon shots so you can see yourself improving over time. All cards are dealt randomly to all players, so the difference between the Easy, Standard, and Pro computer players is in how they choose to play the cards they are dealt. A hint button can be turned on to help you see how the computer Pro player would handle your current situation.

comments: This version of the game of Hearts is perhaps, the worst at cheating thay I have ever played. To start with I am dealt the 2 of clubs 9 out of 10 deals. Constantly dealt the 5 of hearts and invariably other three players have the 2, 3 and 4 of hearts. Plus, I constantly receive the A & K of hearts in the pass. These events happen far to often to be mere chance. These problems did not manifest themselves until after I won the vast majority of the games I played.

Excellent game, however, im experiencing two issues. 1. Since the recent update Sometimes I cant use the backward button on my phone when an advertisement pops up. 2. You have ads larger than the screen that there is no way to close the advert window so i have no choice but to exit the game. These two issues have created frustration. Otherwise, its a brilliant (program) game.

This is the very BEST Hearts Card app I've ever played! Relaxing times & it's fun. I have used other apps for this game which were bad ones! In other words, it felt like there was lots of cheating going on! This üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü Classic Hearts Card Game is Great! The reason I've uninstalled it a few times is because every now & then, it was time to post another card before the game was over ~ but that was impossible ~ all my cards had already been used...must've been a bug hack....Has this been fixed?

Games great, no sound and fair. With the ads, you now are forced to let them play through, can't close and we go from silent game to screaming ads every after every hand you play. So completely muting , is working. But you used to be able to at least skip some ads. Not the case now. Many of the other games we play , at least allow for a few hands between the next ad. Sure wish you would play for 30 minutes to check it out for yourself ,to mute, does not let me hear sound notifications.

I'd buy it to get rid of the ads. I've been playing Hearts 50+ years, the developers need to tweak the algorithm, Isabella shouldn't play the Ace of Spades in front of me unless she knows she can shot the moon. 90% of the time she has other spades to play, I bomb her with the B and then play another spade to check, sure enough, she has other spades to play, bad move, I'm just saying!!!

title: CardioSmart Heart Explorer
description:
The American College of Cardiology‚Äôs CardioSmart Heart Explorer app is designed to enhance the clinician/patient relationship at the point of care.

Features:
- With CardioSmart Heart Explorer, you can review and discuss common heart problems and treatment options with your patients and their caregivers. The app‚Äôs high-resolution cardiac graphics and animation have been optimized for tablets and phones. 

- From the main menu, quickly explore the structure of an animated 3-D beating heart by swiping up or down through 9 basic layers of rotatable cardiac anatomy. Drag from left to right to rotate each image from an anterior to posterior view. Double-tap to return each image to the anterior, beating, view. 

- Also from the main menu, additional layers of anterior and cross-sectional cardiac views are readily available to swipe through to highlight normal and pathological functions in easy-to-understand, high-resolution, 3-D and 2-D graphics. 

- Choose additional cardiac patient education animations and interactive media from within the media gallery.  A scrollable list of helpful explanatory animations and interactive displays are accessible via the media gallery button.  Future versions of the app will allow customization of this list through online downloads of additional media.

- Access a ‚ÄúSend Feedback‚Äù link by clicking the bottom right info button.
Disclaimer:  THIS APP IS FOR EVALUATION  ONLY AND SHOULD NOT BE USED FOR CLINICAL PURPOSES AND ALL SUPPORT IS PROVIDED ON AN AS-IS, AS-AVAILABLE BASIS.

But after seeing all the features it offers, I gave it a well-deserved 5.

Some considerations for the designer are to maybe keep the labels on screen as you rotate the 3d model because they diseappear, also have an option to keep the animated motion going as you rotate the heart as well because right it stops. I really loved it! It helps me learn lots of things. I loved it!
Very simple to use. Advise email link to allow doctors to send patients information

title: Cardiograph Heart Rate Monitor
description:
Cardiograph Heart Rate Monitor - is an application that measures the pulse of your heart, whenever you need !

Cardiographs calculates the pulse or heart rate using the built-in smartphone sensors and devices (camera, LED flashlight, etc.).

You can save your results to check history of results ECG Kardiograf and view graphs of your measurements Heart Blood Monitor.

The clear and intuitive interface, how to use:
- lightly put your finger on the rear camera lens and on the flashlight, 
- hold your fingerprint until measurement is complete,
- do not touch too hard - blood circulation (pulse) can be changed and affect the results
- using a smartphone or tablet without an LED flashlight, make measurements in a well lit area
- during the measurement, stay calm, try don't move and don't talk, because it may interfere with measurement accuracy.

Pulse measurement is useful during exercise, when you are stressed or if you suffer to heart diseases or it may satisfy your curiosity.

Check how fast your heart beat and stay healthy !!!


Warning !
This is not a professional medical equipment. Value of application measurements is  estimated, if you have any doubts, you should consult with a specialist doctor or your personal physician.
descriptionHTML:
Cardiograph Heart Rate Monitor - is an application that measures the pulse of your heart, whenever you need !

Cardiographs calculates the pulse or heart rate using the built-in smartphone sensors and devices (camera, LED flashlight, etc.).

You can save your results to check history of results ECG Kardiograf and view graphs of your measurements Heart Blood Monitor.

The clear and intuitive interface, how to use:
- lightly put your finger on the rear camera lens and on the flashlight,
- hold your fingerprint until measurement is complete,
- do not touch too hard - blood circulation (pulse) can be changed and affect the results
- using a smartphone or tablet without an LED flashlight, make measurements in a well lit area
- during the measurement, stay calm, try don't move and don't talk, because it may interfere with measurement accuracy.

Pulse measurement is useful during exercise, when you are stressed or if you suffer to heart diseases or it may satisfy your curiosity.

Check how fast your heart beat and stay healthy !!!


Warning !
This is not a professional medical equipment. Value of application measurements is estimated, if you have any doubts, you should consult with a specialist doctor or your personal physician.
summary: Cardiograph is an application which measure your heart rate!
recentChanges:
- Improved heart rate detection algorithm
- Fixed minor bugs
- Adding support for french
- Fixed remove ads status update after purchase

title: My Heart Anatomy
description:
My Heart Anatomy app for studying heart anatomy which
allows you to rotate 360¬∞ , Zoom and move camera around a highly realistic 3D model.

My Heart Anatomy gives users an in depth look at the heart allowing them to select , xray view, hide and show parts of the heart as well as view real time animation, draw or white on screen and share screenshots, Audio pronunciation for all anatomy terms and more.

User can select external part of heart to view name of the part or read related information. 

These apps can be of great help for medical students or to anyone who needs to explore heart anatomy in detail with high quality graphic and  features of the app.

title: Heart is in
description:
Have fun sending hearts to your favorite person.

There is only one heart between you and your partner.
If your partner doesn't send a heart back to you, you won't be able to see it anymore. 

Receiving a heart from your partner will leave you feeling special and loved. 
Whether it's your boyfriend or best friend, send your love to the ones you love! 
Your heart will change size and color depending on how many hearts you send each other. 

How to play
1. Download "Heart is in" app.
2. Send invitation code to your partner.
3. Click heart mark on your app and send it to your partner.

title: Heart Rate Monitor Pulse Checker:  BPM Tracker
description:
Heart rate is the most precise heart rate monitor application for any cell phone and it doesn‚Äôt bother with any outside equipment. Use Heart rate app for optimizing your exercise and to track your progress. Access of heart rate ultimately results in Heart break. Heart break causes pain in chest. To avoid Heart break using this app timely examine your heart beat to maintain health and fitness.
Heart rate or pulse is important measure in health and fitness. One of the most accurate Heart rate app which will diagnose your heart and pulse rate. Heart beat vary according to the physical needs of the body. Proper diet is very essential to maintain your heart beat. The activities which will provoke change are physical exercises. You must get rid of the anxiety, stress and illness to have a good heart rate. During sleep slow heart beat is expected around 40-50 bpm.Have fun with LED flash.
Moreover calories are also disturbed due to heart break.

How to use
Put your finger near camera and keep your finger still this will measure your heart rate. You will identify your position(sitting, standing, running and sleeping) and then save it this will give your graph of BPM.Track your progress and keep yourself fit. You will configure LED flash in this app.

title: Heart Rate Variability HRV Camera
description:
Check: Heart rate (Pulse), Heart Rate Variability (HRV), Fitness and Stress level, Cardio calculations track progress and more using only camera.

Usage: Finger should cover camera lens completely (not only flash). During capturing, camera preview should be red and real time graph (right, near preview) should display quasi-periodic signal, find optimal position not to burn your finger by flash.

Feel free to provide comments: Stevan@ecg4everybody.com  

Application provides summarized analysis results (as classes starting from Poor .. to Athlete) using HR and HRV (Heart Rate Variability) analysis, as well as data for sharing and crowdsourcing on the ECG for Everybody.

ECG for Everybody is mobile, complete solution for heart health, fitness and stress level check.

Crowdsourcing in the application is available to everybody to check health, fitness, to compare with others. Participate in the Crowdsourcing, provide useful comments and receive much more of them, get the wisdom of the crowd. Invite your friends who has medical or fitness knowledge to review data, let's share knowledge and make it available for everybody. Our vision is to aggregate all knowledge in heart health, fitness and related fields and to provide it to everybody as well as to connect users in strong smart heart care network. 
Some of data may be used for Big Data collecting, they will be completely anonymized (stored and used).   

Some analysis interpretation instructions:

Normal resting heart rate for adults ranges from 40 to 70 beats a minute. Lower heart rate at rest implies more efficient heart function and better overall fitness.

Heart Rate Variability
HRV correlates with heart health, stress, athletic training, emotional health, and fitness. 
rMSSD (Root Mean Square of Successive Differences) is strong overall Fitness level indicator. Try to have rMSSD greater than 40ms, track your progress in app history graph.
HRV graphs show changes in pulse. 
Poincar√© Plot shows changes in successive heart beats, good dispersion is over the main diagonal.

Spectral analysis
Shows the balance in ANS (Autonomic Nervous System). 
LF/HF is one of nervous balance indicators (low stress) and good values are close to 1. 
For reliable results duration should be 2min+.

Cardio
Get benefits from Cardio using zones calculation and instructions in the app.

Analysis duration
In general, longer analysis provides more reliable results.
 * 10-15 seconds is sufficient for Heart Rate
 * 30 seconds analysis provides HRV measurements
 * One minute analysis provides more reliable HRV measurements
 * Two+ minutes analysis is necessary for reliable spectral analysis

ECG for Everybody
ECG provides more accurate results, check ECG for Everybody: Mobile, complete, Heart health check solution which transforms smartphone to the ECG station, provides fitness, heart health analysis and connection with others through sharing and crowdsourcing http://ecg4everybody.com. Our tests show that PPG based heartbeat detection may have less than 2% error in comparison with ECG based detection. 

ECG for Everybody http://ecg4everybody.com is in early stage and we are open for comments, critiques, advice, cooperation. 
Our Mobile ECG sensing extender is ready for pre-orders. It is an unoque mobile ECG sensing solution which can operate without electrodes and capture up to six ECG channels with dozen lower manufacturing price design.
Get familiar and with additional solutions like ECG generator which is mobile app with peace of gear which transforms mob app generated signal to the real ECG which can be captured using any real ECG device, including our. stevan@ecg4everybody.com

It's good to have flash close to the camera to provide lights through finger, otherwise try to provide good light conditions.

This is not a medical app.

Our vision is to aggregate all knowledge in heart health, fitness and related fields and to provide it to everybody as well as to connect users in strong smart heart care network.
Some of data may be used for Big Data collecting, they will be completely anonymized (stored and used).

Some analysis interpretation instructions:

Normal resting heart rate for adults ranges from 40 to 70 beats a minute. Lower heart rate at rest implies more efficient heart function and better overall fitness.

Heart Rate Variability
HRV correlates with heart health, stress, athletic training, emotional health, and fitness.
rMSSD (Root Mean Square of Successive Differences) is strong overall Fitness level indicator. Try to have rMSSD greater than 40ms, track your progress in app history graph.
HRV graphs show changes in pulse.
Poincar√© Plot shows changes in successive heart beats, good dispersion is over the main diagonal.

Spectral analysis
Shows the balance in ANS (Autonomic Nervous System).
LF/HF is one of nervous balance indicators (low stress) and good values are close to 1.
For reliable results duration should be 2min+.

Cardio
Get benefits from Cardio using zones calculation and instructions in the app.

Analysis duration
In general, longer analysis provides more reliable results.
* 10-15 seconds is sufficient for Heart Rate
* 30 seconds analysis provides HRV measurements
* One minute analysis provides more reliable HRV measurements
* Two+ minutes analysis is necessary for reliable spectral analysis

ECG for Everybody
ECG provides more accurate results, check ECG for Everybody: Mobile, complete, Heart health check solution which transforms smartphone to the ECG station, provides fitness, heart health analysis and connection with others through sharing and crowdsourcing http://ecg4everybody.com. Our tests show that PPG based heartbeat detection may have less than 2% error in comparison with ECG based detection.

ECG for Everybody http://ecg4everybody.com is in early stage and we are open for comments, critiques, advice, cooperation.
Our Mobile ECG sensing extender is ready for pre-orders. It is an unoque mobile ECG sensing solution which can operate without electrodes and capture up to six ECG channels with dozen lower manufacturing price design.
Get familiar and with additional solutions like ECG generator which is mobile app with peace of gear which transforms mob app generated signal to the real ECG which can be captured using any real ECG device, including our. stevan@ecg4everybody.com

It's good to have flash close to the camera to provide lights through finger, otherwise try to provide good light conditions.

This is not a medical app.
summary: Pulse, HRV, Fitness, Cardio, Stress, Breathing, Crowdsourcing, Big Data

title: Heart Trace 2
description:
Heart Trace automatically checks your heart rate at regular intervals via your Android Wear smartwatch and syncs heart rate data with Google Fit.  You can view your heart rate by the day, hour or minute or as a daily summary.

WearOS (Android Wear) smartwatch with heart rate sensor
This app requires an Android Wear smartwatch with a heart rate sensor.  You will also need to connect to your Google Fit account to enable syncing of heart rate readings.  Heart rate reading frequency and accuracy can be configured but are ultimately dependant on your Android Wear smartwatch heart rate sensor.

A word from the developer
I'm a single developer who created this app for fun in my spare time because I wanted my Android Wear smart watch to regularly take my heart rate (can't believe this feature still isn't in Google Fit!). I then went on to become a Google Associate Developer (again in my spare time) and further develop the app. This app has no commercial backing and is still maintained in my (limited) spare time so it can take a while for bugs to be squished and features to be developed and released. Thank you for your support and patience, magic09.

Features
‚Ä¢ Automatically monitor your heart rate.
‚Ä¢ View all your data by the day, hour or minute.
‚Ä¢ WearOS complication.
‚Ä¢ Mobile widgets.
‚Ä¢ Sync your heart rate readings to Google Fit.
‚Ä¢ Export your readings to a CSV file.
‚Ä¢ Sports mode - continuously monitor your heart rate.

In-app purchases
Heart Trace is free.  No ads.  No paid features.  But if you would like to support Heart Trace development you can do so in the app by clicking donate and selecting an option - thank you.

Coming soon
‚Ä¢ Store sports mode session data and sync to Google Fit.
‚Ä¢ Activity detection - auto sports mode.
‚Ä¢ Remove synced readings.
‚Ä¢ Plus lots more - check out the feature list (https://trello.com/b/n5Me1j3O)

App usage
This app is for personal health information and is not a substitute for proper medical assessment or diagnosis.  If you have any concerns about your heart please contact a medical professional.

Permissions required by this application
‚Ä¢ Body sensors - enables heart rate detection.
‚Ä¢ Storage - enables export data to CSV.

Help and support
If you have any questions please get in touch either on email (magic09.apps@gmail.com) or through the Google Groups community:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/heart-trace

Community and beta testing
Want to test out new features of Heart Trace before anyone else?  Just become a beta tester - option in the app listing. Have you got a good idea for a feature? Are you interested in what new features are planned? You can find out more at the Heart Trace Google group:
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/heart-trace

comments: The app fails to do the fundamental thing it is supposed to, automatically monitor your heart rate from your wearable device. Measurements are super inconsistent often leaving several hours or even days long gaps in the log, which I find strange because I can sometimes see my watch's green monitoring light activating on my wrist but no actual reading will be recorded what so ever. It is a shame because the app itself is really great packed with a lot of features, all of which free of charge!

It still needs work, sometimes it doesn't sync, and sometimes it doesn't record heart rate, but works well and consistently enough with minimal battery drain. TicWatch Pro, 20190527, tracking consistency is getting better

The application is good, it's actually better than 1st party heart rate app. On my TicWatch Pro 4G. I was using Facer and 1st party heart rate. With 24h tracking with 10 mins sample interval. My watch battery down to 20-30% at the end of the day. Then I switch to this app, and using a watch face that allow me to config widget. With 5 mins sample interval. My battery stay at 65-70% at the end of the day. Definitely gonna make a donation. Thanks for making such good app for free.
Does exactly what it's supposed to when Google Fit and other apps failed, great work.
I love this app. I wanted to be able to track my heart rate constantly. This does that and also charts my heart rate even minute by minute. Well made great features and easy to use.

title: Hello Heart
description:
*** IMPORTANT NOTE: To use "Hello Heart ‚Ä¢ Premium", you must receive a Employer Code in an email from your Employer or Health Plan ***

What's the simplest and easiest way to understand your heart risk and learn what to do about it? Hello Heart ‚Ä¢ Premium.

‚àö  Understand your heart risk and manage it yourself, simply and easily - from anywhere, anytime
‚àö  HIPAA compliant, FREE service sponsored by your employer. Your information stays safe and secure, and isn't shared with your employer
‚àö  Personalized insights and explanations about the information you want to know
‚àö  Clinically tested
‚àö  Based on the science of behavioral medicine and AMA guidelines
‚àö  Founded by people with the same concerns and issues as you
‚àö  Featured by Apple, FoxNews, Forbes, iMedicalApps
‚àö Real-time explanations of what each of your blood pressure and BMI  mean and how you are doing
‚àö Weekly BP report to see trends and fully understand them
‚àö Friendly reminders help you keep track blood pressure and take drugs on time
‚àö Prescription medications reminders and explanations

=== How It Works === 

Rather than set big, ‚Äúun-fun‚Äù goals to get healthier,  Hello Heart helps you build the simple and enjoyable habit to learn about yourself through tracking. Medical studies prove that one of the best way to change heart health risk is to simply track. You feel good about yourself. You learn about yourself.  You are able to slowly change habits that last for the long term. The only way you will stick with it is if it fun and rewarding.

=== Hello Heart Really Works! === 

‚Ä¢ It‚Äôs easy and satisfying to use.
‚Ä¢ You are rewarded for tracking, caring and learning about yourself, not reducing BP or losing weight, so you always win!
‚Ä¢ No disruption to your daily routine.
‚Ä¢ You never compete against or compare yourself to others.

=== The Mobile Therapeutic with everything you need to manage your heart health ===

comments: 1. I have to log in EVERY time by typing in my password. 2. The app is not sending the BP information to google fit, making it worthless, I might as well use my old BP monitor and manually enter the information. 3. Most other apps get the health data (including my doctor) from Google Fit, hence, if these guys don't push the data, then they are of no use for me.

Horrible app. Keeps crashing. Can't find any doctors if you use the VA. gave up trying to use the Bluetooth. With all the problems that it has I definitely don't trust its security of my medical data.

STILL waiting. Will this update fix something? Doesn't: work offline, doesn't detect BT 50% of time. Early: Much lame. Very trouble. Not impressed so far. This app needs work. * The app does not CORRECTLY read the sensors on Android device. - It repeatedly asks me to turn Bluetooth on (it's already on). - It complains about GPS not being on *when it's already ON*. * There is _NO NEED for GPS_ for this app. It reads a BP cuff, it doesn't need GPS! *Bluetooth does NOT need GPS to function!*
It's just okay. The monitor loses sync with app in phone all the time and diffucult to sync back. Also app also freezes and wont open at all.
App doesn't sync with Castlight after last update. Pointless to take measurements with a Bluetooth device if you can't earn points for taking the time out of your day to measure.

title: Hearts Free
description:
‚òÖ Top Developer  (awarded 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2015) ‚òÖ
Hearts Free brings this classic and popular 4-player trick-taking card game to the Android market. Created to the same high standard as the rest of our games, Hearts Free provides classy graphics, super smooth gameplay, highly scalable difficulty & much more. Hearts has never been so good!

Hearts is also known under a number of different names around the world, including Chase the Lady and Rickety Kate, and is similar to the game Black Lady. In Turkey the game is called Queen of Spades, and in India it is known as Black Queen.

Featuring:

- Full Hearts play, with optional Jack of Diamonds rule
- Card passing options, including alternating (Left, Right, Across, No Pass)
- 18 CPU Hearts players of varying skill (beginner to expert)
- Choose which characters to play against!
- 5 Backgrounds to choose from (or use your own photo!)
- User and CPU player stats!
- Undo & Hints
- Hearts Rules & Help
- Designed for both Tablet and Phone

This free version is supported by 3rd party ads. Ads may use internet connectivity, and therefore subsequent data charges may apply. The photos/media/files permission is required to allow the game to save game data to external storage, and is sometimes used to cache ads.

recentChanges: The app no longer requests Storage permission for stats backup, so therefore stats no longer automatically backup. Instead there are now import and export stats options on the stats screen. Most users were not accepting the storage permission, and this new method of importing/exporting stats can be used without that permission.
comments: It's addictive, especially now while we're stuck at home. However, it's annoying that really the only way to win in this app is that I have to at least in one game win all the hearts & queen of spades. I rarely can't win one set by not doing this at all unless I change one of AI characters to extremely easy/kid mode. And even with uninstalling & reinstalling the app...it often gets way worse!

The game itself is great. Unfortunately spoiled by adds that run for 30 sec's that can't be turned off. I appreciate I am using the free version and therefore have to accept adds, but most other apps allow you to hit an X to end the add if it is not appropriate to you. Shame.

Addictive, but the game does cheat, regardless of the dev responses. At the hardest difficulty, once you hit a good winning run, you'll start getting impossible hands. Don't let it frustrate- it's rigged.
Plays nice. Can be as easy or challenging as you like just by choosing the strength of the opponents. I am using about the cheapest android mobile you can get and have had no problems.

It's ok but the ads sometimes crash the game for me or get in the way, and when playing the game it feels like the other three characters are against you rather than being fair and impartial, which would make the game more enjoyable imo. Overall it's not too bad though when you're in the mood for the game, and the animated avatars are cool.

Also, you now can play the original LIGHTNING LINK‚Ñ¢ games! Lightning-fast Jackpots, Free Games, and the Hold & Spin feature are sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.

Get even MORE BONUSES when you Join Heart of Vegas Communities! Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HeartofVegas
comments: Great game...BUT! Had issues with this game a year ago, but thought I'd give it another go. Graphics and game play are excellent, however I bought credits (AU$70), bet big, won free games (Where's The Gold) then the game froze. Restarted it, recovered the game then froze again. Restarted it, same thing. Third time it just took the free games. No reply from support. You bet big with the hope of winning free games, then it takes away your prize.

This app has the best graphics....but thats it. I've tried buying credits etc to 'pay my way' for better payouts, but all Product Madness are concerned about is making you pay more for something worthless. There is no way you can win any money back, its supposed to be for fun, but you have to pay big ongoing premiums to have any 'fun'. Until l see a better return on the money I've paid so far, they'll not get another penny out of me. You are better off saving your money for real gambling.

I keep wanting to give this game more stars, but they just wont let me. Yes I'm very happy that you put way better values on the daily wheel. Yes I play this game because the games are ones I've played in real casinos...i can't give more than one star because you just make it impossible to win anything...when you go through 5 million coins betting minimum and never get a bonus or win anything higher than double your bet you just want to give up. Plus, the cost of buying coins is ridiculous.

I think its great , you know it costs them money to put these games on here, so to anyone that's not happy just remember these games are free, and entertaining , And it takes our minds off of today's problems, Tomas blanco

Total scam. Fixed games and they expect you to pay for credits? Games don't pay, stupid and totally unnecessary side games (open boxes for items or scratch fixed lottery tickets). The only good thing about this app is that the games look like the real deal but the overall experience is terrible.

title: Heart Rate Monitor
description:
This Heart Rate Monitor measure your heart rate by analyzing the blood flow information from your finger tip.


‚òÖIt is very EASY to use and the result is quite accurate.

‚òÖNow it is offered FREE and allows UNLIMITED number of records and Unlimited number of heart rate measurement.

All the heartbeat data are saved and NICELY displayed to you. They are well organized in categories 

 "REST","EXERCISE" or "POST EXERCISE" 

or you can simply use the state "GENERAL"

Fit for Health Monitoring
‚òÖThis heart rate monitor are suitable for people who are care a lot of their health condition or in need to monitor their
heart rate regularly. 

‚òÖIt suggests you fitness level information. Recent studies shows a higher heart beat rate in rest mode may
be link to a higher risk of heart diseases e.g heart attack, cardiovascular diseases, atrial fibrillation - Afib, stroke, stress and diabetes.  And the more healthy you are, the slower your heart beat rate (but not extremely low) will be in rest mode.

Please be noted irregular heartbeat information cannot be identified because it may only only be fault trigger due to the poor steadiness of the finger putting on the camera. 

Fit for Training Usage
‚òÖIt is also very suitable for people would like to measure their workout intensity e.g Running, Gym or any kind of training. It is perfect for High Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) or Cardio.

‚òÖHR Monitor shows your exercise intensity level calculated based on your personalized maximum 
heart rate zone. And shows you which heart rate zone you are in -
"Recovery Zone", "Fat-Burning Zone", "Target Heart Rate Zone" and the "High Intensity Zone".
Target Heart Rate Zone is perfect for Cardio Exercise.

Just talked to my friend, he used to do pulse rate measurement using pulse meter and keep log by writing done for some reason. But now using this app, he can take his heartbeat any time and have a nice log to present.

Feeling enough with the limitation from other free heart rate app? Now get this heart rate application to measure your heart pulse rate. 


Recognition Algorithm
The heart rate monitor app detects your pulse by using the camera of your phone. When your heart beats, the volume of the blood flowing through your finger tip be changed. This application use the camera to capture the image and use algorithms to recognize the heart beat. Please ensure the environment is well-lit for the best performance of the camera.


Instruction:

1.Start application
2.Put the "TIP" of your finger on the camera. (Make sure that your hand is not cold).
3.Ensure Flash LED is on/environment is well-lit and Don't press too hard.
4.The result should show in a few seconds.


Note: 
DISCLAIMER
- Heart Rate monitor is for reference purposes only. Consult your doctor if required.
- Since this application uses flash, in some devices  may cause hot LED flash.
- heart rate detection not intended to be used as a medical device.
- This Heart Rate Measurement app not intended for heart disease or condition diagnosis (afib, heart murmur)
- It does not detect blood pressure or bloodpressure.

.
This is Ad supported application for it's free functionalities

comments: Does what it claims to do. Only one problem - the full screen ads. Edit: There is a checkbox for connecting to Google Fit (which I have installed). But, is it sending out ALL of the data? I have no idea because Google Fit is receiving, or displaying, only the data starting from the day I installed Fit. Is there a way to verify if ALL the data is being sent? Where is it being stored? How do I access it?

The first time I tried this I burnt my finger on the camera lens because the flash stays on. Would not recommend this app. I have the Samsung Health app that came with my phone, I just wanted to see how they compared to each other. I deleted this one immediately.
It works very well it is very close to reading which I measured manually almost all the time I don't know what techniques they are using but the result it very close to actual reading.

Heart Rate Monitor checks one's heart rate quickly. I tried another heart rate checker, and it took so long to check one's heart rate that I was nearly at rest when it completed. I changed my heart rate checker yesterday, and I am not changing back. Heart Rate Monitor checks the time required for one's heart to beat a specific amount of time, not the amount of times one's heart beats in a wildly variable amount of time.
Readings are pretty accurate. I check them manually about every 4th time. It is a good app if you need to monitor your pulse regularly.

title: Heart Rate Monitor
description:
Heart Rate Monitor - Heartbeat Health Fitness Camera
Do you want to monitor your heart rate with only the camera of your phone? With the help of Heart Rate Monitor this becomes all very simple. With this app you can easily measure your pulse with just your phone.

Disclaimer
This is an app which tries to determine your heart rate as best as it can, but it's not medical equipment. Do not base any medical decisions on the results of this app. Please contact a doctor when you are in need of medical advice.

How it Works?
* Getting started is simple. Give the app permission to use your camera and start measuring.
* Put the tip of a finger carefully on the camera lens.
* Relax your arms and hands.
* Make sure there is a bright background, otherwise the app won't be able to detect your heartbeat.
* The camera flash can help to create a bright background. It will get hot, don't burn yourself!
* Please login with your Google account if you want to save your heart rate in Google Fit.

It really is that simple to monitor your heart rate with the help of Heart Rate Monitor. Go on give it a try.
If you have any queries or issues for which you need our assistance: Feel free to mail us, contact info is in the app.

Video
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ouvRPxZualQ

Also available on https://23apps.com/heart-rate-monitor

comments: It kept saying it didn't detect anything no matter what I did. When it finally worked it said 40 bpm, not true. I didn't really like it. Just my opinion though.

Used once and then it told me i had to purchase! Not free!!! Worked great when i did use it. It has weekly purchase options available, but i dont recall anything about a price being added after i downloaded it. Very unhappy about that.

This does exactly what is says, with zero bloat or hassle. There are simple real-time instructions on screen for how to use, and get the best and most accurate results. The app also allows you to turn on or off your flashlight simply while using the app to increase accuracy, but also warns you that depending on your phone your finger might get hot.  It does all of this with a UI that is so streamlined there is basically zero learning curve. Just install, follow the onscreen instructions and voila, Instant and accurate heart rate info.  It is simple, clean and accurate. I measured my heart rate with a blood pressure machine at a drugstore while using the app simultaneously with the other hand and it was consistently within about 5 BPM of the final output of the blood pressure machine.  After a short run the app showed my BPM increase accurately (tested with this Sony wristband thing my friend has).  Ad Free, Bloat Free, In App Purchase Free, and only asks for permission to use your camera. No other heart rate app else even comes close.

You have to provide a basic version for free . If it works useful way can go for premium version. I have seen very different heart ratings in 3 days ..Felt it is not working properly.. just uninstalling now

this is the best Heart rate app I've seen in a long time. No bloat, continous measuring, a graph background to measure intensity, can toggle flash on or off and syncs with Google fit. Excellent. i don't rate many apps but this is with my time so others can experience the app that allows others away. It would be better if an audio beep was added for the heart rate but this is really good

title: Hearts: Card Game
description:
Hearts Free is a classic competitive card game, and MobilityWare‚Äôs artificial intelligence in this free Hearts card game ensures YOUR play has the competitive edge, Hearts card master!

Hearts may call to mind card games like spades plus cribbage plus euchre - but if you don‚Äôt play those games, don‚Äôt worry - this free Hearts game will teach you how to play with our intuitive AI. Plus, our artificial intelligence adapts to your Hearts card game play style. Play feels fair, even though your artificial intelligence Hearts opponents are some smart bots. But while playing them can feel like a challenge, MobilityWare‚Äôs Hearts free hints AI feature is at your disposal and the smartest of them all!  AI bot opponents offer another major benefit - you can play them offline, so no wifi is required to play Hearts free!

Ever play a card game with real online users and experience inconveniences? Never worry about other users taking too long or abandoning a game in this free card classic. Enjoy the adaptability of AI, and benefit from MobilityWare‚Äôs free Hearts hints system, which always puts you in a clear position to win the free Hearts card games you play! Plus - this free Hearts game is loaded with artificial intelligence and we guarantee when you play, you‚Äôll just notice your sense of relaxation and fun.

Get Excited for Features!
Whether you‚Äôre going to Shoot the Moon as a Hearts card master or just starting to get into the game or totally new to Hearts, you‚Äôll find our free card game has a setting for your comfort and challenge level.

Artificial Intelligence 
- We cannot stop talking about this card game‚Äôs adaptive and fair AI features! 
- Playing Hearts free is a cinch with smart opponents
- And our even more intelligent free Hints feature

Play Offline, Anytime
- Wifi? Who needs it?
- No need to wait around for real users to log on with this free Hearts card game
- And no need to have game delays when their internet lags
- Reliable AI bots want to play cards with you all day, no internet required

Fair Play
- Learn to play a game with our simple start guide and free automated advice (which you can turn off!)
- Use as many free Hints as you like, powered by the smartest AI in our app!
- Use the free Undo function as many times as you like if you need to rethink your moves

Some Tips for Hearts Beginners!
- Scoring points in Hearts free is not a good thing (unless you collect ALL available points)
- Each hearts suit card is worth 1 point
- Beware the Queen of Spades - a card worth 13 points!
- If you collect all points available in the game, they get thrown to your opponents in a dramatic feat called Shooting the Moon!

comments: Way more adverts than in their other games, one between every deal. Only saving grace in not stupid length ones. Graphics and style of gameplay didn't really work for me. Shame as enjoy all other games of theirs I play. The best online version played was the old Yahoo one back around the xp days, would be a very good model to aim for.

I'm giving this game 5 stars because it is what it is. Yes there are ads a lot of ads but you get to ask them out pretty fast in other words you don't have to wait 30 seconds to watch a crummy boring uninteresting ad which is good. The game itself is pretty simplex the graphics are plane but the gameplay is very very fast paced which I like. You get rewards here and there and you're playing against a lot of bots but they don't try to hide the fact. So to the Developers good job

I think it's rigged in one person's favor. Fix it or I quit. I won't play with snake until you quit giving him all good cards.ok now thanks. Why do you always have one that hardly takes any tricks. Can't be random .makes the game suck. Now mr spaceman hardly takes any pts. Cut it out! Can't be random. I won't finish game that has one player way ahead every time same one

This is better than the other Hearts game I've played. However, occasionally I'm given credit for taking the Queen of Spades when I actually didn't. Also, I do feel I'm ganged up on, ie. three players (the computer) all-in-one playing to make it impossible to win. But I still am addicted to this game. After all, someone has to lose! Thanks for a great passtime.

Taught me how to play and now lots of fun and have started playing online. Only downside is there's no options for no ads. Would be nice to have the option of a one off fee if you prefer of ¬£1-¬£2 like other games.

title: Heart Diseases & Treatment
description:
In this application, we have covered most heart diseases that provide a resource for people newly-diagnosed with heart-related diseases. The Heart is the most important part of the body so we need to take care of it. 

This application provides you the details about the heart disease for your references. so please read it carefully.

In Heart Disorder application, we have tried to cover most common heart-related disorder with their description, causes, symptoms, and treatment.

Heart disorder will give you the privilege to read heart-related articles from heart experts into the app and app will notify about heart care tips time to time. It's a perfect app to prevent and improve heart daily.

Doctors and heart specialist can now add any other disorder and write blogs.

Features:

- Heart care articles (Blogs written by experts)
- Heart care tips (Tips by experts)
- Heart-related A-Z diseases, causes, symptoms, treatment
- All human Heart disorders and treatment
- Self-care of Heart Disease
- Home remedies for Heart care
- A user can submit articles to use in front to 100 thousand users.

title: Heart Care Health & Diet Tips
description:
Heart Care Health & Diet Tips is a Free App with Information on Tips Risks Dieting & Nutrition ideas for better health of heart to avoid stroke cardiac attack and other heart diseases for heart patients and well as healthy male and female. If you require additional assistance from real professional dietitians, app allows you to contact the dietician from the App to consult your queries and problems online. You can even seek for your personalized diet chart from the dietitian by using the options from the App.

This App has following sections:

* Cause of Heart Diseases
* Warning Signs
* Food to Eat
* Food Avoid
* Risk Factors for Developing Heart Diseases
* How to lower the risk of Heart Diseases
* General Tips

Dieting ideas and tips of this app have been carefully reviewed by Experienced and professional dietitians carefully. Besides this, if you have any medical history or have any additional queries, you can contact dietitian by tapping the Contact button within the App.

title: Heart Walk
description: Make your recruitment and fundraising easier with the American Heart Association‚Äôs Heart Walk application. Update your story or photo, send pre-written emails and text messages, quickly and easily make posts to your social media channels and deposit checks right from your app! Monitor your activity by connecting to Google Fit to track your steps ‚Äì all from the palm of your hand.
descriptionHTML: Make your recruitment and fundraising easier with the American Heart Association‚Äôs Heart Walk application. Update your story or photo, send pre-written emails and text messages, quickly and easily make posts to your social media channels and deposit checks right from your app! Monitor your activity by connecting to Google Fit to track your steps ‚Äì all from the palm of your hand.
summary: Fundraise from your phone with the American Heart Association's Heart Walk App
recentChanges: Fix Activity Recording Bug
comments: Login information doesn't work on app. It also easy easy to navigate. You just figure things out by clicking.
There is literally no way to track your steps on here. The entire activity page is missing.

It's okay but lacking some major user-friendly features. I hate that each and every time I go to open it, I have to log-in, it's not top secret stuff, why can't you keep it unlocked or offer biometric log-ins? I also hate that they have all these features to share on social media platforms I don't use like Twitter or Facebook. Just give us a way to easily find our shareable link so we can post wherever we please.

Once I install and log in I shouldn't have to enter my password again. When you're in a browser, I get it. When it's an app on my own phone, either remember my credentials or use the phone's biometrics. Also, an app should not notify me to make sure I have the latest version if I'm on the latest version. Other than that, the app works well enough.

When the APP syncs with Google Fit (not sure why it can't plug in to FitBit), it adds the same activity multiple times. There are a bunch of folks that are going to be accused of "fudging" their data. Also, the data can't be deleted or edited. There is a screen for it, but it doesn't do anything, even though it says that it is deleting it. I removed the app and reloaded thinking that it was just a version behind, but I have the latest version. There is absolutely NO WAY that I am going to trust this application to solicit donations.
