title: Cardiac diagnosis (arrhythmia)
description:
If the measurement result is abnormal, please recommend an electrocardiogram(EKG,ECG) test.

[Guide to Access Permission for Using Cardiac Diagnosis App]

1. Camera (required)
- It is necessary to detect the blood circulation of the measurement site.

2. Storage space (required)
- It is necessary to save the measurement result.

3. Microphone (required)
- It is necessary to use recording function in real time measurement.

This app can detect heart rate and arrhythmia(Atrial fibrillation (AF or Afib)). 
So arrhythmia, bradycardia, and tachycardia are detected to show the state of the heart as normal, caution, and danger.
If the arrhythmia is detected recommends an overhaul in the hospital.

If the arrhythmia is detected,Get treatment.
Share the application with many people around you.
Even if the results come out as normal you can help prevent the disease should be checked regularly.

How to use - 
1. Gently place the tip of your finger on the camera lens
2. Click start button.

comments: Inaccurate. Gave it 2 stars because I like the idea of the app, but the heart rate was consistently 10-20 bpm above my Garmin heart rate monitor (which is trusted) and the actual pulse in my wrist - way off. The app consistently told me I have an arrhythmia, but said the same for everyone who tried it - including my red sofa cushion which is apparently also bradycardic lol. I'm sure I was on the camera lens well, and remained very still. If you download this app, don't take it too seriously.

Not sure what i think about this yet. Ive been having chest pain for over a mo now. This says arrhythmia & bradycardia then normal & tachycardia. Bradycardia is something I often have w/ 42-60bpm but ER says panic attacks not arrhythmia and tells me call a shrink! I STILL HAVE CHEST PAIN & KEEP PASSING OUT! Ugh
Keeps saying I have an arrhythmia, so I put it on my cats back, says her heart rate is 61 (not accurate) and that she has an arrythmia. Not even close, don't put any faith into this app at all people
I find this app to be more accurate than most of the others, unless i use it while i have cold hands, then of course it will only give innaccurate readings.
Locked me out since I would not allow it to have access to my audio device. There is no need for this to have access to my audio device.

title: Heart Star
description:
Heart Star is an adorable puzzle platformer where you guide two little friends through two parallel worlds. Swap between the worlds to solve unique puzzles. Overcome all obstacles with the power of teamwork!

Game Features:
- Unique world swapping gameplay!
- 50 levels of mind bending puzzles!
- Cutting edge retro pixel graphics!
- Catchy and cute retro soundtrack!
descriptionHTML:
Heart Star is an adorable puzzle platformer where you guide two little friends through two parallel worlds. Swap between the worlds to solve unique puzzles. Overcome all obstacles with the power of teamwork!

Game Features:
- Unique world swapping gameplay!
- 50 levels of mind bending puzzles!
- Cutting edge retro pixel graphics!
- Catchy and cute retro soundtrack!
summary: Swap between the worlds and overcome all obstacles with the power of teamwork!
recentChanges: -Fixed broken mute music and mute sounds buttons.
comments: This is honestly the first game I've ever completed, usually I get incredibly bored with them because of how repetitive they are, that I just give up half way through, but not this one. The controls are easy, and each level is different from the last, using logic to solve them. It only took about three days of straight playing to complete, but honestly I would play it all over again if I could! 10/10

Great! Ads kept ruining the mood and slowed down my gameplay which sucks because I was becoming so addicted so quickly until the ads broke the mood and on occasion crashed the game. I feel like you can use the ads for a reward system for example you could watch an ad to gain point to unlock skins in a store or add different modes but i recomend you guys just keep the ads out of the main game in general but other than that this game is so cute and extremely fun for everyone!!

So adorable and precious. The mini story and cuteness was the best part. The controls worked well, but could be tweaked further, and the gameplay was fun and satisfying, but I felt it could have been more creative; the mechanic and idea was great, but something more than spikes and falling to avoid would have been nice. There were lots of ads, but they were spaced out well enough that it wasn't too bad, and most ads were appropriate (except the "Choices" game ad popping up). All in all, good!

Finished the game and loved it! It was super cute and the characters were just adorable! The levels got difficult but still not impossible! Learned about it through my younger sibling and he likes it as well! Great game!!

Don't get me wrong this game is amazing. The problem is its difficulty. There are some already hard levels with difficult-to-pull-off-puzzles which you have to complete TWICE IN A ROW. Now okay it's a late game level but still it gave me a impression of a tricky puzzle game. ( which it is except for some levels ) but the late game delivers me an ordinary platformer game experience which is bad in my opinion. So, if you are new to plaformers it may be a little to hard for you.

title: Heart Breaker
description:
*Purchase within the application*
Unlock Game(All stages after Floor 6 are open):US$ 1.99

Three men have sold their souls vowing revenge on the Archfiend. They eat HEARTs for infinite strength! Here comes Dungeon exploration infinity classical hack & slash!
Heart Breaker is a hack and slash RPG in which you will venture into infinite dungeons. The player gets weapons, protectors, and HEARTs from enemies. These HEARTs can be equipped with a variety of effects and transplanted into items for various skills. Fight as you like with many weapons and HEARTs combined! Eat redundant HEARTs to gain experience. Eat for more strength in Heart Breaker.

The Heart Breakers get power from the sources of enemies they beat, that is, "HEARTs."
Beat enemies to cut, remove, and eat their HEARTs! The HEARTs will give them power.


-Added 'CLOUD-BACKUP' and 'RESTORE'
  When you quit this App under good condition of your network connection, your gamedata will be backed up on the cloud storage.
  By using 'RESTORE' at the option menu, you can write-back it into your device(e.g., after exchanging your device)


*Purchase within the application*
Unlock Game(All stages after Floor 6 are open):US$ 1.99
(Up to Floor 5 is available for free. Your purchase information is available with the same Google account on different smartphones. This information won't be lost even when the App is uninstalled.)

Extra Pack(change player's gender and class, etc):US$ 0.99
 you will be able to use the following functions:
 -change of player's gender
 -change of player's class
 -change of player's name
 -FLOOR selection of starting exploration
 -Replacement of items for sale(with payment of a specific sum of Gold)

comments: The game is good. But some of lacking incontrolls. No auto target. Its hard for mage to kite enemies. And also on floor 6 you need to ublock the game for real money. Sorry to say i am not investing money in any game. You are forcing to unlock the game.

Some of the reviews here really display the immaturity and spoiled attitude of mobile gamers. It's so unreal that you'd uninstall and complain about $2 to support a dev who made such an amazing game and even let's you try before you buy. I used to play this game for hours on end and it got me through 2 deployments. Not sure if the dev's are still updating as I got a warning that the game was built for an older version of android, but everything still works fine.

Having only played the first 3 floors/levels, I cant help but wonder how this game has gone so unnoticed. A simple, yet detailed and deep dungeon crawler, especially in regards to character customization. In short, this reminds me of the original Diablo in its simplistic and welcoming approach to the hack and slash genre. Thankfully, there are no corny or retro / pixel graphics. Finally, a simple yet addicting hack and slash that tries to be challenging and (most of all) fun. No p2p, so far.
It lets you play to the 6 th floor then you have to pay to unlock the game..waste of playing time..

title: Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse Checker & Step Counter
description:
A healthy heart means a healthy life, both physically and emotionally. Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse Checker & Step Counter is the best heart rate monitor you can find on the store that also has a built in pedometer for accurate step count throughout the day.
Smartphones these days have again stopped integrating heart rate monitoring sensors in mobile phones as heart analyzers and pulse checkers are now common in smart bands. Most of us now know the importance of a heart rate monitor and the benefit of a step counter for daily fitness goals.

Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse Checker & Step Counter is basically a technological innovation where we use the camera of the smartphone to accurately calculate the pulse of the user. It does not require any dedicated sensor or any other hardware. Also for step counter we create a pedometer with the help of step counter of the smartphone.

Some salient features of our Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse Checker & Step Counter are jotted down below.
	‚Ä¢	Our app uses phone‚Äôs camera to calculate the heart rate.
	‚Ä¢	It detects the pulse and heart rate in under 10 seconds.
	‚Ä¢	Our app has unlimited count for pulse checking and heart beat analysis.
	‚Ä¢	Our Pedometer (Step counter) uses phone‚Äôs step counter to accurately calculate number of steps taken each day.
	‚Ä¢	Our Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse Checker & Step Counter is a free app with some ads that can be avoided by subscribing to our in app purchase.

Download and install Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse Checker & Step Counter and we assure you that you have a very well thought our fitness tool in your pocket. We have put in a lot of effort in integrating the best features for our overall and heart fitness. It is coupled with the pedometer (step counter) becomes a heart analyzer as it can detect in different training zones. With heart training zones we mean that you can use this pulse checker app at different states of your body like resting, walking, running, jogging and check the readings against the global benchmarks. 

How to Use!
The use of our Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse Checker & Step Counter is very simple and can be learnt in a few quick steps;
	‚Ä¢	Open Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse Checker & Step Counter and start it.
	‚Ä¢	Place your index finger on the camera of your phone and keep it static there until the feedback light on your screen turns Red.
	‚Ä¢	You will be able to see your pulse graph as Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse Checker & Step Counter starts to calculate through the camera.
	‚Ä¢	Once the data collection is complete you will be shown the results on the screen with some helpful tips for fitness and health.
Some points to keep in mind while using Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse Checker & Step Counter app.

Note (Disclosure) :
        ‚Ä¢	This Heart rate Monitor app is NOT an alternative to your doctor.
	‚Ä¢	This app does not provide medically accurate and actionable data. Always 
consult your doctor in case of any emergency or prevailing condition.
	‚Ä¢	Sometimes the flash of the smartphone gets really hot, avoid touching it while covering the camera with your index finger for heart analysis.

Use Heart Rate Monitor: Pulse Checker & Step Counter to record and measure your heart rate this app can help you identify fatigue and stress before it‚Äôs too late.

title: The Heart App ¬©
description:
The Heart App¬© on a mission to reduce fatalities due to heart diseases.

The Heart App¬© aims to help people find out if they are at risk of, or are developing a heart attack based on some questions regarding their seemingly serious or not so serious chest complaints. These questions try to mimic the sequential procedure that heart-specialists follow while diagnosing a patient. The Heart App¬© can also be of use to paramedical staff operating in field.

A majority of patients get some warning symptoms before a full-blown heart attack occurs, and if they are provided appropriate treatment in time, heart attack can even be avoided! It is these avoidable fatalities that we hope to stop with the help of the heart app¬©. A critical step in this direction is the information about heart attacks and coronary artery disease packed in the app in practical and easy to read compartments. The Heart App¬© would not only improves people‚Äôs awareness but also provide them a ready reference in their time of need.

Ample amount of research categorically points out that mortality and morbidity due to heart attack can be substantially prevented by two key methods- awareness and timely-treatment. Of the two key factors, timely treatment is a more concrete factor and if we could somehow equip people with accurate information via a pervasive medium then millions of lives can be saved. Probably The Heart App¬© can be of help here

At the time of heart attack every second is important since the damage to heart is time dependent. Maximum deaths occur due to abnormal heart beats.  These abnormal heart beats are due to electrical instability in the heart muscles which are dying due to heart attack.

The Heart App when utilized by nonmedical personnel helps bring medical attention to people at risk.

In this new version we have added the following:

INR Clinic-  
Warfarin and Acitrom are used to prolong the normal clotting time in human body and are known as anticoagulant. They are required to preventformation of unwanted blood clot or prevent progression of already formed blood clot.

Diseases where you need this drug

‚Ä¢   Metallic Prosthetic Heart Valves

‚Ä¢   Atrial fibrillation

‚Ä¢   Deep vein thrombosis

‚Ä¢   Pulmonary Embolism

Here user will know about the calculation of doses of warfarin or acitrom as per their PT-INR report. By using this app their record of INR will be maintained automatically and this will be of great help when they will visit their doctor for consultation. This digital way can help patients who are unable to connect with doctors frequently.

 
My records- 
In this section a person can maintain the record of his blood pressure and diabetes along with medication. Hypertension or high blood pressure and Diabetes are the most important risk factors for heart diseases and stroke. This record will help the physician in the management of these patients.

Here one can store his/her treatment related documents which will be very handy when they visit their doctors.

Diet & Exercise 
This section will provide relevant information regarding diet and exercise to live a healthy life

Health updates- 
In this part user will get relevant, useful, evidence based information regarding medical filed.
 
The Heart App is meant solely for the welfare of common man but we cannot do it without your help. We request you to share The Heart App¬© with your family & friends, and contribute to our small effort of fighting heart diseases which claim millions of innocent lives.

Please note that The Heart App¬©, by no means, intends to replace the clinical judgment of a doctor; rather its main purpose is to educate people, prevent them from ignoring an emergency and enable seeking early treatment.

Dr.Rajeev Rathi Cardiologist                          drrajeevrathi.com

title: UK Heart FM London 106.2 live
description:
UK Heart FM London 106.2 live, is the unofficial APP to listen to UK Heart FM London 106.2 live, your favorite station, this APP is a fluid alternative, easy to install and use. You can listen to UK BBC Radio 1Xtra Live, while doing another activity such as using Whatsapp, Instagram or Facebook, without interrupting the transmission.

On air since 1994, UK Heart FM London 106.2 live is a radio network of 21 radio stations operated by Radio Global. It broadcasts both network and local programming. Some of its notable current presenters are Emma Bunton, Jason King, Toby Anstis and Mark Wright, among many others.

UK Heart FM London 106.2 live is a regional radio station owned and operated by Global Radio that belongs to the Heart network.
The station's local programming is produced and broadcast from Heart's Leicester Square studios and all networked programming originates from Global Radio's London headquarters.

The station plays Hot AC music and is available on FM, DAB digital radio in London, and across the UK on Freesat, Sky, Freeview, TalkTalk TV and Virgin Media. It is also available on MXR regional DAB multiplexes in the North West, North East, the Severn Estuary and Yorkshire, as well as on Switch Digital in central Scotland.

With star presenters and huge cash competitions, Heart turns up the feel good with the biggest songs from the 90‚Äôs, 00‚Äôs and now.

Note: This APP is developed by a Fan of UK Heart FM London 106.2 live and is not intended to be the Official APP of said station, rather this APP is presented as an alternative for users to choose from where to listen to UK Heart FM London 106.2 live.

title: Love Heart Frame
description:
Let express your love with romantic photo created by this app! Heart - the symbol for love - is the best way to say I Love You, and this free app can help you make the most romantic pictures ever. To make your photo even more beautiful, just add cute stickers, add text and decorate it, apply special filter and effect, then you have a perfect image and love memories. This app is also a powerful tool to easily collage & edit your photos with lots of nice layout and grid.
TOP FEATURES:
* Choose heart frame from nice collection
* Select image from device Gallery or Camera. Adjust it to fit the picture frame
* Add text to picture and modify its color, shadow, font, stroke...
* Decorate picture with cute stickers and artwork text
* Apply special filter effect if you want, and share it to social apps
* Use collage function to turns your pictures into art with lots of nice grid
* Use editor function to personalize your image with text, sticker, and filter
* Use Free Style Frame function to make collage frame which you can add any images you want, rearrange and decorate them, so that you have a unique art photo!
* In saved gallery album you can find all photo you have designed, just browse and send it
* Set hd wallpaper to make your phone screen more beautiful
* With Single Frame, you can add one image to your product. With Double picture frames, you can add 2 photos to your product
* The sticker categories include Lovely character, emotion, artwork... combine with creative background to help you easily make nice pictures
If you have any feedback about this free app, please send to this email: creativejoygames@gmail.com
CreativeJoy

title: Heart Rate Monitor
description:
Innovative display and documentation of the heart rate in combination with a Bluetooth Smart chest belt. 
   After the configuration of the individual settings and training zones, and a connection to the chest belt the heart rate is visualized as an absolute value of beats per minute and as a percentage of the stored maximum heart rate value of the user. Additionally, the deviation (variability) of the separate heart beats is displayed in milliseconds. The different training zones are individually colored and easily comprehensible.
   After starting the recording, the statistical values (MAX, AVG, and MIN) are updated continuously. Furthermore, the intensity of the training (TRIMP, CR10, kcal, a timeline of HR, zone duration) is displayed as an accumulated sum, as percentages, and as a graph.
   Recorded training sessions can be documented and shared in several ways like Dropbox, email, or others. The recording produces a summary of training results as a PDF file and a CSV file containing the raw training data.
   Best results will be achieved with the recommended chest belt from BM innovations GmbH.
descriptionHTML:
Innovative display and documentation of the heart rate in combination with a Bluetooth Smart chest belt.
After the configuration of the individual settings and training zones, and a connection to the chest belt the heart rate is visualized as an absolute value of beats per minute and as a percentage of the stored maximum heart rate value of the user. Additionally, the deviation (variability) of the separate heart beats is displayed in milliseconds. The different training zones are individually colored and easily comprehensible.
After starting the recording, the statistical values (MAX, AVG, and MIN) are updated continuously. Furthermore, the intensity of the training (TRIMP, CR10, kcal, a timeline of HR, zone duration) is displayed as an accumulated sum, as percentages, and as a graph.
Recorded training sessions can be documented and shared in several ways like Dropbox, email, or others. The recording produces a summary of training results as a PDF file and a CSV file containing the raw training data.
Best results will be achieved with the recommended chest belt from BM innovations GmbH.
summary: Heart rate monitor, innovative and smart in combination with a BLE chest strap
recentChanges: Fixed bugs
comments: I tried a different app first and paid to get a chart facility to discover that if there is a temporary disconnect with the chest strap the app had to be restarted. Then I found this app. Charting is free. And it reconnects. It does the job. My only gripe is that it hides the files it creates. It uploads from the app but it would be nicer to use a sync program I use for other files.

The readings are inaccurate. By a wide margin. Max heart rate on a garmin watch using the polar h10 and an oura ring was 79. This app said 125. Graphing could be better. Being able to zoom would be good. When I try to load an overnight dataset the app crashes.

Excellent and simple to use app. I use it with my scosche rhythm plus and it works perfectly. The graphs and charts are simple to follow. I also use it to record my heart rate which I sleep. There is also an option to export the results to pdf or csv. Definitely the best free fitness apps. üôÇ

This appears to identical to the Acentas app, other than differences in the interface design. I liked the Acentas version, it does all I need. The biggest problem with it and this app is that it doesn't save data as you go. If the app crashes or is inadvertently closed then all data for that session is lost. To say that this is irritating after a six-hour cycle ride is to understate things. This version of the app shows a slightly lower BMP than Acentas, and is probably more accurate.
Simple. Connects all the time. Could use for sleep, all day long, whatever. Just a continuos running graph, which the fancier apps don't do. Nice.

title: myWorkouts Heart Rate Monitor Sport GPS Tracker
description:
myWorkouts records your sports activities (movements via GPS, heart rate via Bluetooth¬Æ or ANT+‚Ñ¢ sensor).

Outdoor-Sport

Out on the road? Download free maps for offline use and use them anywhere without a mobile network.
Ideal for hiking, mountain biking, pedelec, eBike and road cycling, mountaineering or mountain climbing, on a ski tour, cross-country skiing or nordic walking.
You always know where you are and where you came from.
Find out how far and fast you were on the road and the incline of the tour.
Share tracks as a GPX file with friends.
Download GPX tracks and take them as a template for mountain biking, mountain biking, ski tours and hiking or tracking.
Export your workouts as GPX or FIT file to import in sport portals like STRAVA, Velo Hero and the like.
Find new ways on the maps.

You do not need to be a super-sportsman and can also use the app in a foreign city to find the parking or hotel (map).
The download of offline maps goes directly from the app.

Indoor-Sport

Keep fit during the winter and continue training, e.g. at the treadmill, indoor cycling, cross-trainer or rowing machine!
Use myWorkouts as a tachometer and view your heart rate (Bluetooth or ANT+ sensor required), cadence, calorie consumption during exercise so your training is efficient and you remain motivated.

Get motivated

Follow your activities and let yourself be motivated by statistics on higher achievements.
Use the resting heart rate and the maximum pulse to calculate your optimal training zones (for effective cardio training with optimal heart rate).
During the exercise, you can see how long you have exercised in the planned intensity and how much calories you burned.
You can feel the performance increases everywhere, whether mountain bike MTB, running, mountain running, indoor cycling, ergometer, treadmill, rowing machine or fitness training.

For me?

The app is ideal for mountain and bike sports enthusiasts who run mountain bikes or racing bikes in summer, running, mountaineering and hiking, and in winter they keep their fitness with indoor cycling, treadmills, steppers, cross-trainers, etc.
GPX tracks can quickly be viewed and saved with the app. With the offline map, you can orient yourself with the GPX tracks.
Stay fit with the app!

Track data

Whether indoor fitness or outdoor sports - you can record this:

- GPS track (geo coordinates), route, altitude, speed, slope, altitude, export in GPX format
- heart rate (*) measures pulse (course, min, max, average, time zones), Bluetooth and ANT+ sensors supported
- calorie consumption (*) shows burned calories
- cadence and or speed (*)
- step frequency, distance, number of steps, calorie consumption, speed
- environment temperature (*)
- barometric pressure (*)

(*) Some of the values require additional sensors (ANT+‚Ñ¢ or Bluetooth¬Æ LE)!

Note
You can use myWorkouts without additional devices, but some features (heart rate, calories, cadence) are only active if you have a chest strap that sends your heart rate via ANT+ or Bluetooth.
Then you need:

- an ANT+ or Bluetooth LE heart rate monitor
- a smartphone with ANT+ or Bluetooth Low Energy
- ANT+ or Bluetooth LE combined speed and cadence sensor
- ANT+ or Bluetooth LE cadence sensor
- ANT+ or Bluetooth LE speed sensor
- ANT+ step frequency sensor (foot pod, distance measurement, calorie counter)
- ANT+ temperature sensor

Install now the free app and record your tours and tracks via GPS along with heart rate (Bluetooth or ANT+) and cadence. Download the free offline maps! Use the app for your indoor training. Here we go!

recentChanges: Bugfixes and minor improvements, especially regarding export of workouts.
comments: I like the app. Linked to my cheapo CooSpu chest band ($30) without prob. Really just use it to track pulse but selectable target ranges are nice. Kcal doesn't match my StairMaster, it is consistantly 20% higher, which is nice actually. Tracks weekly time, time in zone and number of workouts and saves it. I don't export stuff, but I think it can. Not sure what creator gets out of all this, maybe an evangelistic health nut?

Simple interface yet very useful and satisfying user expectations. I still can't believe there's no annoying popup ads. Even this app doesn't have pro version as it's already been providing full features. I'm using myWorkouts with chest strap hr monitor. No problems with connection. Will try with gps feature soon.

A high quality app that's free? Where's the catch? As far as I can tell, none! Works with my off-brand HRM. Intuitive user interface. This deserves ten stars out of five! One wish: I actually paid to get my RMR measured and I would like to be able to put it in. So unimportant but if it's an easy win, put it in the backlog! üòã
Very informative and good features. It would be really nice to add a picture at the end of a workout to capture the gym equipment information.
Great App. Not 100% sold on actual calories burned. My Zone and other apps say I burned more calories but I workout harder using this app because I feel this app may be more accurate.

title: BLE Heart Rate Monitor
description:
BLE Heart Rate Monitor connects your phone to heart rate measuring devices using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) and allows you to view your heart rate on your phone.

Premium Features:
* Chart to show your heart rate over time in real time w/ pan & zoom.
* Map that shows your heart rate color coded route in real time.
* Export your heart rate data to either TCX file format or Comma Separated Value (CSV) text file format so you can analyze it externally. CSV data format: Time, Heart Rate, Latitude, Longitude, Altitude (meters above sea level), Speed (meters/second), Heart Rate Variability (milliseconds), Calories Burned (kcal), Battery Level (%).

Each premium feature is unlocked independently.

Displays battery level for Polar H7 and other HRM devices that support sending battery level information.

Due to Android Bluetooth Low Energy support limitations, this app only supports devices running Android 4.3 and above. Please note that your device must have hardware that supports Bluetooth Low Energy.

It has been verified to work with the Mio Alpha, Polar H7, BlueLeza HRM Blue, Zephyr HxM Smart, Viiiiva, 60beat Blue, Beets BLU, and Wahoo heart rate monitors and should be compatible with any BLE heart rate measuring device.

summary: Connects your phone to heart rate devices using Bluetooth
recentChanges: Fixed data export bug on Android 8+ devices.
comments: This initially looked good. It saw my monitor and gives a simple clear display. I paid for the chart upgrade. Except there does not seem to a way of permanently linking a device. Every time the app starts it has to ask what device to connect to. More annoying is that if it temporarily loses contact it won't automatically reconnect.

Works very well with my cheapo chest strap monitor. Nice big readout, with BPM and current exercise zone. Just remember to switch on Bluetooth first, otherwise it hunts down every enabled device in the street (TVs, laptops, tablets, phones ...). If you want to log your workouts you need to register and pay, but I can live with that
Exactly what I was looking for. The free version includes heart rate range alarms that you can customize. It works with my Bluetooth chest HRM from Decathlon. Perfect for MAF training.
So far so good. Easy straight forward way to link chest strap with Android and get heart rate without hassle

Holy cow! I can't believe the app has finally been updated. It's been pretty annoying having to export my workout file manually each time after the app would force stop and close. But I'm here to say it actually exported my workout straight to Dropbox like it used to years ago. I nearly left this app a few weeks ago, after years of use... Actually I tried others, but none of them could quite do everything I needed from them like this one can. So glad I stuck with BLE Heart Rate Monitor!

title: Thoughts From Heart
description:
‚ô• Love is the greatest principle to be learned in the family setting. If parents will influence and direct and persevere with love, then members of the family will also make that principle a part of all they do. The principle of love can overcome many parental mistakes in the raising of ‚Ä¶ children.
‚ô• Sometimes, though, it is difficult for parents to express love. It isn‚Äôt that they don‚Äôt love their children, it is only that they have a difficult time demonstrating their love openly. And because their love isn‚Äôt expressed in easily recognized ways, their children sometimes fail to appreciate their parents‚Äô love and respond to it.

‚ô• When you're in a relationship with someone who has truly captured your heart, you might be bursting at the seams with wanting to tell them how you feel. If you have a crush on someone, it may be a little bit more complicated than that. Communicating your feelings for someone can be tricky at first, but there are many other ways of expressing yourself other than blurting out, "I love you." A blimp with giant hearts flying across the sky might be the flashy way to get your message across, but simpler ways of communication exist that might hold a bit more meaningful in expressing your heartfelt emotions.

This wonderful app will help you express your love, feeling, thoughts from heart within family and with loved ones!

title: Heart Beat Rate Monitor
description:
- Use your smart phone camera to monitor your heartbeat & bpm.
- Image analysis process tracks your blood flow and provide very close and reliable measurement of your heart rate in real-time.
- This most accurate Cardiograph heart rate monitor app does not need any external hardware.
- Fitness coaches, nurses, doctors, EMTs also can trust on this app.
- Just place index finger on phone‚Äôs camera couple of seconds and know about  your Heart Rate.
- It uses your phones built-in camera to track color changes on the fingertip that are directly linked to your pulse. This is the same technique that medical pulse oximeters and Cardiograph use.
- Calculate bpm ( heart beat per minutes) and pulse signal in real time.
- Great design for a great user experience !
- It's Measure your cardiovascular system when you are under stress and check how fast your heart is beating before show result.
- You can see your heart rate, so quickly, precisely and simply.
- Share your bpm, beat per minutes measurements in social networks like Facebook, Google+ & Twitter or via email
- calculates your heartbeat rate using fingerprint or thumb print impression
- Install this Cardiograph app now and keep fit.

EASY TO USE
- Results could be affected by pressing too hard or blood circulation will be altered.
- Use your smart phone or tablet without a LED flashlight in a well-lit area (bright daylight works best)
- Remain calm during the measurement and don't  move too much to get measurement accurac
- cold fingers can effect the result. 


*** WARNING: This is not a medical product.***

title: Heart Hero Challenge
description:
How far would you walk for your heart? Find out this September. The Heart Hero Challenge: A World Heart Day App is the only app that helps you keep your heart healthy, reach your walking goals, learn in a fun away about your heart and bond with team mates. All you have to do is set your steps goal, join a team within your company and start walking. Fun badges and power-ups, actionable videos and articles help you stay motivated and keep your heart healthy. Join a growing community of Heart Heroes today. 
Our hearts work incredibly hard to keep us alive. Every day, they beat around 115,000 times and pump around 7,600 liters of blood ‚Äì the same amount a fire truck can hold! 
Thank yours by returning the favour and leading a healthy lifestyle. Be a Heart Hero and look after your heart with the Heart Hero Challenge: A World Heart Day App! 

Engage in the World Heart Day walking challenge:
Set up individual and team goals in September, the month of World Heart Day, and start pursuing your health goals in an easy and fun way. 

Learn about your heart health in just a few minutes a day:
Access short and actionable videos, articles and quizzes and discover how to keep your heart healthy and strong.

Stay motivated and on track to reach your goals:
The World Heart Day app makes keeping your goals easy through the power of games. Win badges, unlock power-ups and see if you can help your company walk to the moon and back. 

Create and join heart healthy company teams:
Get to know your team mates better, discover the fastest walker and support your colleagues while pursuing personal and team health goals.

title: Heart Beat
description:
HeartBeat is an application that helps you measure heart rate with your mobile phone without having to buy or use other specialized devices.
HeartBeat works by tracking changes in capillaries at the fingertips to calculate your heart rate. Your phone needs a camera and flash to perform heart rate measurement.

title: Equate Heart Health
description:
Equate‚Ñ¢ Heart Health app for the Equate‚Ñ¢ Premium Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor

You‚Äôve got important work to do for your health. 
We‚Äôll help make it easy.

If you‚Äôve recently been diagnosed with high or low blood pressure, it can be a real challenge trying to get your numbers back where they need to be. The Equate‚Ñ¢ Heart Health app takes away the struggles of logging blood pressure readings, offering simple, straightforward tracking. It also makes syncing your readings over Bluetooth to your phone or mobile device smooth and effortless with no need to pair devices.

You‚Äôll appreciate the following Equate Heart Health features:
‚Ä¢ Detailed dashboard with filtering allows you to customize your profile so you can monitor your readings through easy-to-decipher charts and information.
‚Ä¢ Set reminders to take your blood pressure readings so you can stay accountable and track results.
‚Ä¢ Manage multiple users in one household.

title: Heart Rate Monitor - Measure Your Heartbeat
description:
Turn your smartphone into your personal Heart Rate Monitor!

Heart rate or heartbeat is an important measure of health and fitness. Using the Heart Rate Monitor app, you can now measure and monitor your heart rate! And also use it for optimizing your exercise and to track your progress.

Why is this the best heart rate monitor app?
‚úì Incredibly accurate in measuring your heartbeat. 
‚úì Free with unlimited heart rate measurements. 
‚úì Multiple user profiles. Track the heart health of your family members in a single app. 
‚úì Save and share your heartbeat graphs with your health care provider. 
‚úì Enhanced by Health Infinity insights.
‚úì Connect to Google Fit.
‚úì Backup your measurements securely.

How to use the Heart Rate Monitor free app to measure heartbeat?
‚òÖ Place and lightly hold your index finger against the back camera lens and flashlight.
‚òÖ It uses your phones built-in camera to track color changes on the fingertip that are directly linked to your pulse. 
‚òÖ Do not press too hard, otherwise, blood circulation will be altered and the results could be affected.
‚òÖ Remain calm and try not to move too much during the measurement, as this can compromise measurement accuracy.
‚òÖ Do not measure with cold fingers when the blood circulation is poor.

Is it accurate?
Heart Rate Monitor is highly accurate as it uses the same technique that medical pulse oximeters use. It does not need any external hardware. 
The app then uses our Award winning Heartbeat Fusion algorithm used by Health Infinity for detecting the heart rate accurately. 

What is a Normal Heart Rate?
A normal heartbeat for adults ranges from 60to 100 beats per minute (BPM). However, keep in mind that many factors can influence it, including Activity level, Fitness level, Body size, Stress, Emotion, Cardiovascular health, etc. 

What is a Resting Heart Rate?
Your resting heart rate gives you a view of your heart's fitness. It varies depending on your age and training level. A very fit and athletic person has a lower resting HR than someone who is less active. Eager to know if your fitness level has improved? Measure your heartbeat on a regular basis and monitor the progress of your resting heart rate. 

Fitness Usage:
It is also very suitable for people who would like to measure their workout intensity e.g Running, Gym or any kind of training. It is perfect for High-Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) or Cardio.

Multiple User Profiles:
You can create profiles for each of your family members or friends, and each of them can have their own individual measurement history.

Note:
- If your device doesn't have a built-in camera flash, you need to take your measurements in a well-lit environment (bright sunlight or close to a light source).
- This application should not be used as a medical device.

For Health App Developers:
Use our framework to add Heart Rate measurements to your app. Contact us for documentation and sample code. 

Product Hunt: https://www.producthunt.com/posts/heart-rate-monitor

Made with ‚ô• by Droid Infinity!

title: Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath - Hospital Drama
description:
Become a doctor in a romantic medical drama with aspiring intern Allison Heart!

GameHouse and Blue Giraffe proudly present the latest GameHouse Original Story, starring your favorite doctor, Allison Heart! 
Heart's Medicine - Doctor's Oath is an intense medical drama tied to a casual game that‚Äôll move you to tears. The game has a gripping and unique storyline, original singer/songwriter music, highly detailed artwork and animation, cool addictive gameplay and an insane amount of heart. If you enjoy games that focus on great storytelling, this game is for you!

‚ù§Ô∏è Experience the life of a doctor as you rush to find a cure for an unknown disease!
‚ù§Ô∏è Your search for a cure will take you through six exciting new hospital wards, from the Clinic to the Morgue.
‚ù§Ô∏è Play the full game with no extra charges, thanks to our free-to-play model. 
‚ù§Ô∏è  More levels to play than ever before! Enjoy 240 levels at launch, with more to come!
‚ù§Ô∏è So many extras! Unlock new story scenes, level up your character to earn helpful bonuses, and purchase the upgrades YOU want to buy
‚ù§Ô∏è  Party with Oliver and his guinea pig friends, Punky and Olive.
‚ù§Ô∏è Master new mini-games like a true doctor, all in medical style.
‚ù§Ô∏è Additional levels will be added in the future, giving you even MORE of the game you love!


Follow Allison as she begins her last rotations as an intern at Queensburrow Bridge Hospital, on her path to graduating as a fully-fledged doctor! Unfortunately, things never go smoothly for Allison, and this is no exception. Dr. Ermey, the lead physician during her clinic rotation, seems to have it in for her, and threatens to fail her. Allison ends up watching her chances of becoming a doctor shrink by the minute, desperately searching for a solution, but unable to find one.
However, everything gets put on hold when a patient with a mysterious disease is admitted to the hospital. Several doctors end up becoming infected themselves, including Connor, Sophia‚Ä¶ and Dr. Ermey. When the CDC quarantines Queensburrow, it‚Äôs a race against time for Allison and the other doctors to find a cure before more deaths occur. 
Your assistance will be invaluable to Allison as she tries to beat the clock and find a cure in time! Experience love, intense action, realistic drama, crazy funny moments and the beauty of celebrating life in Heart‚Äôs Medicine ‚Äì Doctor‚Äôs Oath.

Follow Allison on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/heartsmedicinegame/

Follow GameHouse on Facebook:: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

*Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Dr. Cares and Fabulous:* https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

comments: I absolutely love this game it gives you back story, intrigue, and a real interest in the characters. I absolutely love it!!! I just wish there was a way to get energy either from friends or from watching ads more because I hate waiting until my energy fills up again maybe they can work that in some how but honestly I have no issues with the game it's GREAT üëçüëçüëçüëç

Love this game series I am subscriber. I don't mind the in app purchases I've made a few. My problem is the special events, I have the same problem with them all. Currently with the Halloween I have gotten to chest number 8 and am no longer getting credit for the skulls I've earned. So I can never finish an event. I stopped playing for awhile because of this issue and the fact that I can't get support in the game to work either. I haven't gotten credit for the skulls in the last 3 levels

I have been playing this game for a long time now and it's wonderful with the storyline and the game play it's been improved drastically. The only thing I'm complaining about is that it has a few bugs. When I just played I had a level with Ryan and a mobile clinic with tray decay and limited tray space. I have played all the Heart's Medicine games, and even purchased the monthly subscription to play them. This game however is completely different.. title: Auscultation - Heart, Lung Sounds, Cardiac Murmurs
description:
This application allows medical students and healthcare professionals to improve their auscultation skills with our unique collection of heart and lung sounds which were recorded in real patients.

All the normal and the abnormal cardiac sounds are included in the application and they are reinforced with animated phonocardiograms. 

Repetitive listing to these short audio clips will help the doctors and medical students to enhance their diagnostic capacity in heart sounds, murmurs, and lung sounds efficiently. 

However, nothing is a substitute for clinical practice. So, do not forget to use your stethoscope frequently. This application will be a handy tool to supplement your clinical skills.

title: Healthy Foods For Heart
description:
An article from National Institutes Of Health suggests that coronary heart disease (CHD) begins with damage to the lining and inner layers of the coronary (heart) arteries. Several factors contribute to this damage. They include :
# smoking,including secondhand smoke
# high amounts of certain fats and cholesterol in the blood
# high blood pressure
# high amounts of sugar in the blood due to insulin resistance or diabetes
# blood vessel inflammation

Plaque may begin to build up where the arteries are damaged. The build up of plaque in the coronary arteries may start in childhood.

Overtime,plaque can harden or rupture (break open). Hardened plaque narrows the coronary arteries and reduces the flow of oxygen-rich blood to the heart. This can cause chest pain or discomfort called angina.

If the plaque ruptures,blood clots fragments called platelets stick to the site of the injury. They may clump together to form blood clots. Blood clots can further narrow the coronary arteries and worsen angina. If a clot becomes large enough,it can mostly or completely block a coronary artery and cause a heart attack.

A healthy diet can help reduce your risk of developing coronary heart disease and high blood pressure.

title: StressScan: heart rate monitoring and stress test
description:
Just place a finger over the camera for two minutes, and StressScan will analyze changes in your heart rate interval and scientifically measure the level of your mental and physical stress on a scale of 1 to 100.

- What is the principle behind StressScan? ‚àí 
Many of the functions essential to maintaining human health are controlled by the autonomic nervous system. It is medically recognized that the balance of the autonomic nervous system can become disordered through fatigue and other stress, stemming from causes such as work and human relationships. By analyzing the waveform of your heartbeat as measured at the fingertip, StressScan can analyze the balance of your autonomic nervous system and measure your stress level on a stress index of 1 to 100.

- You can trust Stress Scan! - 
The technology used by Stress Scan is based on heart rate variability analysis, which is widely recognized in the field of heart rate analysis and autonomic nervous system research. 
Although heart rate variability analysis technology is not yet generally well known, many medical institutions and companies have taken an interest and are beginning to put it to use. The technology is seeing use even at the cutting edge of stress care, including adoption by the US military to treat post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) in soldiers returning from the battlefield, and by NASA for astronaut training and health management.

- Usable in a range of scenarios! - 
¬∑ Periodic checking of daily stress level
¬∑ Checking the effects of favorite meals and drinks on stress
¬∑ Checking relaxation while traveling or at a favorite spot

- Device compatibility -
StressScan is intended for use with a camera- and flash-equipped smartphone. It is not usable with devices that do not have a camera and flash.

- Usage environment -
An Internet connection is required to use StressScan. External support for measurement functions is used for complex stress analysis.

recentChanges: bugfixes
comments: Scanner takes 3 minutes and if it thinks your finger moved at all it restart. It can be very frustrating and obviously a probability towards the accuracy of the final scan. I'm still sticking with it I'm going to give it a 30-day trial I'm halfway through that. I find it useful but I do think that you should be able to add more tags.

This is a good app. I compared the results using Samsung Health stress meter ( I use a Note phone which has a heart rate monitor), and they were fairly accurate. Even the heart rate was accurate to the beat if 2-3 beats per minute. I tested in resting conditions, after exercise, ( where the HRV is minimal, so stress is maximum) and Samsung Health stress results and this app results match perfectly.

This app's heart rate is pretty accurate, but the stress level is just useless. Even if I measure in the middle of a severe panic attack, it says I have low stress. Half the app is in English, half is some Asian language. Not recommended for stress measurement

The ability to use camera for heart rate is very innovative. The app checks the variance of the heart rate from the median and has some predefined set of calculations to get the percentage. This may not be accurate way to calculate mental stress, but the condition of the heart. However, the bpm shown is perfect. So 4 stars, but 1 star less because the stress percentage is not always accurate. It shows different values when taken one after another for me.
This is a must have app. It helps you to monitor your stress levels! The monthly calendar is great so you can see how well you are doing at managing your stress. High recommend!

title: Heartbeat Monitor - Pulse & Heart Rate Checker
description:
By using this application, you can check your heart rate and pulse rate anytime and
anywhere by just placing your fingertip on your camera. There is a medical
reminder module where you can add your medicine data and the application will
remind you every time. Your heart rate data gets stored under your profile section
so that you can have a look at whenever you need it. We have been one of the
best heartbeat monitoring apps, our application shows your heart rate results in
less than 30 seconds.


‚≠êNo additional hardware required

For using this application, you don‚Äôt need any additional device/hardware. Just
open the app and keep your fingertip on camera, and hit ‚Äòmeasure‚Äô. Your results
will be shown within 30 seconds.

‚≠êMedication Reminder

In this module, you can save tour medical records such as medicines name,
frequency, dosage info. You can also add a picture of your prescription or
medicines that you want to take, and also you can set the start date and end date.
A reminder will be popped up every time and you will never ever miss your meds.

‚≠êHeartbeat Monitor ‚Äì Features‚≠ê

‚úîFast and meticulous results
‚úîAutosaved results for accessing later
‚úîReal-time pulse graph
‚úîReal-time pulse sound
‚úîMedication Reminder
‚úîFree to use

Technology used:

The technology behind the application is the same as it is used in the hospitals
when they take pulse using fingertips. This process is known as
photoplethysmography. Which is a simple optical technique to detect changes in
blood flow.

User Guide:

 ‚û° Hold the tip of your index finger over the back camera.
 ‚û° Do not press too hard, as it will restrict the blood flow and will show inaccurate
readings.
For best results, hold your finger for 25 seconds to get an accurate heartbeat
measurement.

***Please consider buying the premium version, to remove ads and unlock
unlimited measurements.
***We welcome all ideas and suggestions, please mail us at: connect@sofvare.com


Note: Heart Beat is not a replacement for any medical device.

title: Heart Rate Monitor
description:
Heart rate monitoring is very important for everyone's health. With Heart Rate Monitor, you can measure and monitor your heart rate most accurately.

Heart Rate Monitor is a smart heart rate measurement app that tells you your heart rate quickly at any time without the need for heart rate monitor belts or other health monitoring devices. Your smartphone will do the job and tell you your pulse rate right away. It is easy, isn't it? Try measuring your cardio tracker at waking up or after training.

How to use the Heart Rate Monitor Free App:
‚ô• Place and hold your finger (index finger) lightly on the camera lens and flash. Then press start to measure heart rate. Hold until your heart rate finishes (only takes a few seconds). See results.
‚ô• Do not press too hard while measuring your heartrate tracker, if not blood circulation will be changed and your application results may be affected.

‚ô• When using a smartphone or tablet without a Led flashlight, be sure to do so in a well-lit area (daylight works best).
‚ô• Keep calm and do not move too much during measurement, as it may affect the accuracy of the measurement results.

Functions:
‚ô• Extremely accurate heart beat measurement.
‚ô• Graph illustrating heart rate tracker, cardiograph.
‚ô• Heart rate measurement history: easily monitor your heart rate with general chart by month.
‚ô• Easy to use with an intuitive design.
‚ô• Free heart rate measurement application.

Attention: 
- The Heart Monitor should not be used as a medical device. If you have any concerns about your heart's condition, please consult your physician or general practitioner.
- In some devices, heart rate may make the LED flash very hot.

I measured twice using this app, and it said my HR was 49 and then 59. I manually took my pulse, and it was 88. That is a pretty big difference! Seems useless to me.

after downloading app, attempted the finger reader 3 times, would not read. Uninstalled the app then reinstalled it to be sure it wasnt user error, still would not read. Downloaded another app, works beautifully. Uninstalled this app due to not working as expected.

Tried it out while in a rested state and it came back in the normal range. Only thing I dont like is I have to put my fingers on the camera lens as opposed to the screen. Other than that not a bad app
Having episodes of my heart beating to fast, this will let me know when and how often my BPM is to high. I love the graph it has, so I can see the history of my BPM at a glance.

In addition, you can set reminders, set goals, and share your history with your family or other relevant care team members.

comments: App used to work amazing. Now after the latest update it no longer allows me to use the app to begin a blood pressure ready. I have to manually enter the BP reading after I initiate it on the cuff itself. So much for ease of use Bluetooth. Not the most efficient. Most times I can't get the app to load fast enough to record the readings. So I have to start a whole new reading.. Then I can record it.

Terrible app! Extremely unresponsive to touch input (i.e., it takes 10-20 attempts at tapping/swiping to get anything on the screen to respond), there is no way to see a list of all the readings that have been taken (you have to TRY to swipe through the list of readings at the top), and it simply WILL NOT share the results to any external source. The "Share" button is as unresponsive as the "close door" button on an elevator. This horrible app renders a very overpriced BP cuff nearly useless!

This app is highly unreliable. Won't start the device (take a measurement) half the time and over a week ago just stopped working completely. Won't pair to device or take measurement now. Tried all the basic troubleshooting methods...none worked. Uninstalled and reinstalled the app...now trying to get it to pair and re-establish my user account. Very frustrating.

This app worked intialy, then the glucoose feature stoped working quickly followed by the BP feature, it no longer update my BP readings to the app, defeating it purpose. Waste of Mony if the app doesn't work.

It works like it is supposed to once you get your phone to identify it by Bluetooth. The app. has all these instructions telling you the hard way to do things. The easy way is simply to drag the screen down like you do on any other app. to update info and it will upload all your BP pressure info and tabulate it on an ongoing basis. As for the hard way, that works too, but it's like all things that use Bluetooth it can be slow and sometimes not respond. The simple way avoids all that, just drag the screen down and forget the rest.

title: Heart Rate Analyzer
description:
Introduction.
Heart Rate Analyzer is the App that allows you to perform a comprehensive data analysis of the Samsung heart rate sensor for both IR and RED sensors. Getting heart rate sensor data is possible only for Samsung devices, that are equipped such sensors OR some other Android devices that have the same sensors. But getting the results of analysis can be done on any Android device, if you transfer the sensor data from the Samsung devices by using external microSD-card or Google Drive cloud service.



Features.

Completely NO ads.

Oximeter.  Calculation the oxygen saturation (SpO2).

Possibility to save the raw heart rate sensor data of both IR and RED sensors to the internal memory, the external memory (e.g., micro SD-card), or to your Google Drive.

Possibility to load heart rate sensor data on another Android device using a micro SD-card or your Google Drive service.

Possibility to get heart rate sensor data with a duration between 30 sec and 30 min.

Possibility to create a database of your heart wave data for a long period of time for future analyzing.

Detailed visual inspection of heart wave data (finger arterial pressure FAP waveform).

Comprehensive data and statistical analysis of the many heart wave parameters, including long term data on one diagram. Besides the oxygen saturation, these parameters include heartbeats per minute (bpm), perfusion index, stiffness index, reflection index, peripheral augmentation index and more.

Color-defined values of the heart wave parameters and manual adjustment the alerting thresholds.


If you have any problems or any suggestions to improve this application, please feel free to contact


by e-mail: info.sergiosoft@gmail.com


Thanks!

summary: The App performs a comprehensive data analysis of Samsung heart rate sensor.
comments: App shows exact measure data but it has no correction algorithms to calculate Hart rate. I got Hart rate mostly above 150bpm. It's twice as much as the true value. I switched to Samsung Health app which calculates my Hart rate correctly. By my opinion this app is useful for nerds and data analysts but not for regular users. This app has no annoying ads.

This is not supported by rog phone 2. I will say that from looking at it, this app looks superb and would most likely rate five stars if I did work. The reason why is because my phone does not use Samsung hardware or software. What stinks is this app looks like it's exactly what I want. I also want to thank the developers for using either no ads or no intrusive ads.

Phenomenal app. Thanks a lot to the developer for his hard work. Really detailed and polished. Uses the heart rate sensor and spo2 sensor of your phone to give detailed results about your vitals. No ads no permission except for the actual sensor in use. Bless you sir (note* app gives easy to understand outcomes in results page and uses the actual sensor than can be found in many phones-not the camera lens** i think the very latest samsung phones don't have that..so please check first.)

This app brings more than I could think of as I was looking for a heart rate app that uses a Samsung Galaxy heart rate monitor instead of a camera. I also wanted to save the output, since that's impossible in the Samsung Health app. This app shows a lot more data than just the heart rate. I'm considering to get my doctor's degree to understand it all. Anyway, great app and I would be happy to contribute in some way!

Wow. So much information. Make sure if your phone has a light next to camera... Use that. Not the camera to read the info. I made this mistake. It kept making me nervous because it would say that there was issues with my heart. As soon as I used the little square next to the camera everything went to normal. So after much research you're supposed to use that little square next to the camera to put your finger on. But the results are amazing. If you want more information press the top right button and click all options.

title: Cardiology Mnemonics, ECG, Heart Sounds & Murmurs
description:
ABOUT:
This mnemonic is well DESIGNED WITH COLOUR AND IMAGES of related topics  to help you not only memorize but also understand what you read. The contents are also arranged in topic wise &  alphabetical order to ease searching of required contents. .In our efforts to providing latest and updated illustrations, most of the IMAGES ARE ONLINE IMAGES, SO THE USER NEEDS NETWORK CONNECTIONS to visualize these images and this will help us updating the app with latest and most important images of the related topic within short period.

title: FibriCheck - Check your heart, prevent strokes
description:
Check your heart rhythm with the medically certified FibriCheck app on your smartphone. Keep an eye on the health of your heart, detect cardiac arrhythmias in good time, and avoid complications such as a stroke. Have you been diagnosed with cardiac arrhythmia in the past? You can also use the app to monitor your arrhythmia.


Measure your heart rhythm with your smartphone


‚Ä¢‚ÄÉQuick and easy: It takes just 60 seconds to check your heart rhythm. Place your finger on the camera of your smartphone, and put your mind at ease.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉNo need for another device: All you need to take measurements is your smartphone.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉMeasure whenever you want: Are you experiencing symptoms, such as palpitations? Open the app and take a measurement immediately.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉRegular measurements: With FibriCheck, you can measure your heart rhythm twice daily. This way any changes in your heart rhythm will be detected more quickly.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉNotifications: Set up notifications for your measurements.


Request a review of your measurements


‚Ä¢‚ÄÉReports:  After your measurement, we will send you a detailed report with clear advice.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉShare your results with your doctor:  You can easily share the medical report with your family doctor or cardiologist. Please note: in Australia and America, FibriCheck can only be used under the supervision of a licensed healthcare practitioner.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉMedical experts:  Has our app detected an irregular measurement? Ask our team of medical experts to review your results.


Medically developed and approved


‚Ä¢‚ÄÉDeveloped on the basis of PPG: PPG is a technique with ECG quality that uses light to detect cardiac arrhythmias. It measures changes in the size of your blood vessels by using the flash of your smartphone camera. These are then converted into heart rhythm measurements.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉDeveloped together with doctors: FibriCheck was developed in collaboration with a reputable Belgian hospital and university.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉMedically approved: FibriCheck is trusted by doctors and researchers worldwide thanks to its CE marking and FDA and TGA approvals. Please note: in Australia and America, FibriCheck can only be used under the supervision of a licensed healthcare practitioner.

‚Ä¢‚ÄÉApproved by ORCHA: ORCHA, the world's leading health app evaluation & advisor organisation, gave us a quality score of 85%.


Try FibriCheck free of charge for 24 hours. After that, you can keep an eye on your heart‚Äôs health starting from ‚Ç¨ 3,99 per month.
 (Note that exact prices can vary depending on your location, currency and exchange rates.)

The FibriCheck application has FDA and TGA approvals and is a fully-fledged Class IIa medical device under the Medical Devices Directive (93/42/EEC).
Its manufacturer, Qompium nv, is ISO 13485:2016 certified.


The instructions for use are available in the app and on our website: https://pages.fibricheck.com/ifu/app

title: Electrocardiogram (ECG) Rhythm App: Heart Axis
description:
"Electrocardiogram (ECG) Rhythm App: Heart Axis" is designed for health care practitioner to determine heart axis in vector degrees from an electrocardiogram (ECG) result. The heart axis represents the major vector of ventricular activation, which is the overall direction of electrical activity. It is important to assess the heart axis of a patient with suspected heart disease.

Why should you choose "Electrocardiogram (ECG) Rhythm App: Heart Axis"?
üî∏ Simple and very easy to use ECG app.
üî∏ Accurate and precise calculation of cardiac or heart axis.
üî∏ The electrical heart axis is shown in vector degrees.
üî∏ Interpretation of the vector degrees result, namely normal heart axis, left axis deviation (LAD), right axis deviation (RAD), and extreme axis deviation.
üî∏ It is totally free. Download now!

"Electrocardiogram (ECG) Rhythm App: Heart Axis" is a simple application to determine heart axis by using an electrocardiogram (ECG) reading. "Electrocardiogram (ECG) Rhythm App: Heart Axis" app is designed to help health professional in clinical practice, intensive care, or emergency department. Heart axis or cardiac axis is the direction of action potentials during ventricular depolarization. In "Electrocardiogram (ECG) Rhythm App: Heart Axis" app, you need to input the QRS complex deflection in lead I and lead AvF. The electrical heart axis will then be shown in vector degrees. The interpretation of the vector degrees result is provided. There are 4 interpretations in "Electrocardiogram (ECG) Rhythm App: Heart Axis" app, namely normal heart axis, left axis deviation (LAD), right axis deviation (RAD), and extreme axis deviation.

For more info contact us at:
www.imedical-apps.com

title: Hello Heart
description:
Hello Heart - Heart rate Monitor  is an important measure in health and fitness. Using Accurate Heart Rate Monitor app, you can now measure and monitor your heart rate!


‚òÖ Incredibly accurate in measuring your heartbeat
‚òÖ Free with unlimited recording
‚òÖ Easy to use with intuitive design
‚òÖ No additional hardware required

How to use the Hello Heart -  heart rate monitor free app to measure your heartbeat?

To use this heartbeat counter, just put your finger on the phone's camera and stay still, the heart rate is shown after few seconds. Covering a part of flash may help heartbeat counter to become even more accurate.

What is a normal heart rate or heartbeat?

A normal resting heart beat rate for adults ranges from 60 to 100 beats per minute (BPM). However, keep in mind that many factors can influence the heart rate, including Activity level, Fitness level, Body size, Emotion, etc. Generally, a lower heartbeat at rest implies more efficient heart function and better cardiovascular fitness.

Consult your doctor if your resting heartbeat is consistently above 100 beats per minute or if you're not a trained athlete and your resting heartbeat is below 60 beats a minute


NOTES

- Hello Heart - Heart rate monitor app should not be used as a medical device.
- In some devices, heart rate monitor may make the LED flash very hot.

title: Heart Rate
description:
Heart Rate is a heart measurement application that leverages similar technologies used by pulse oximeters. You place the tip of your index finger on the main camera of your smartphone - covering the lens, and hold it for a couple of seconds for pulse to be detected and measured. The app will do the measurement and show the result, which then is stored with your user profile.

Features:

- Heart Rate Measurement
- Real-time PPC Graph
- Auto-Stop or Continuous Mode
- Heart Rate Zones
- Custom tags for different types of measurements
- Measurement History
- Sharing on Social Media

Make sure to put your finger tip gently on the camera lens, as pressing to hard reduces the blood flow and the results are harder to get.

Make sure to Register and benefit from:

- Daily, Weekly, Monthly and Yearly Measurement History
- Unlimited Measurements
- Profile Customization
- Google Fit Integration
- And much more

If you like our app please leave a review while if you have any comment or feedback to share with us, feel free to send us an email at hello@zombiesoup.com

title: Heart Care
description:
Heart Care is a mobile application that brings easy-to-use, useful and simple tools that will help you to monitor your health, and keep track of all your physical activities and vital signs measurements always close to you.

Through the mobile application, Heart Care will be with you at all times of your day, allowing you to monitor your heart rate whenever you find it convenient and necessary, in a practical and simple way.

By analyzing your measurement history, you can compare various situations in your routine and see how your body responded to each type of physical stimulus. This way you can tell your doctor more clearly about the evolution of your heart's behavior. And it will set treatments and medications more accurately and safely, making consultations more efficient.

Whenever the patient has a right and quick service, cases of heart attack or stroke principle have the risk of death decreased by up to 95% of cases.

Therefore, it is very important for you to monitor your heart at various times of the day and in different activities of your routine.

Heart Care is not a clinical tool. It is not intended to replace the exams and checkups you need to do.

Features that the application will provide you with:
‚Ä¢ Capture of heartbeat, through gadgets, or your own phone;
‚Ä¢ Understanding the context of your day and your heart health, when you inform how you feel and what you were doing, when measuring your heart rate;
‚Ä¢ Store the history of your heart rate;
‚Ä¢ Access to challenges for health promotion, in a simple way in its routine.

Register:
After you download the application for free in this store, users will be able to register to access the tools and benefits of the application.

This registration will initially be simple and can then be completed with all necessary and relevant health data so that the application can be increasingly intelligent and useful for each user.

Measurement:
The measurement of heart rate can be done in two ways: through smart gadgets (smartwatch or bracelets) or simply through the camera and flash light of your mobile phone, making this measurement accessible to everyone. In both cases, the information is synchronized and stored in Heart Care.

Capturing and storing the data:
The measurement of the heart beat can be performed at any time or at certain intervals; as a suggestion: when you wake up, before and after exercise, after meals, at work, at rest, on stressful days, before bedtime, or at any time of your choice.

The records are stored and a history presented by intervals and times that were performed. It is possible, through a quick visualization, to follow the regularity and behavior of your heart.

The use of Heart Care, besides not being a clinical instrument, does not substitute for medical care, clinical exams or the accompaniment of specialized professionals.

The application has the function of providing a monitoring tool, control of medical and historical commitments, in an accessible and useful for all patients.

title: Heart AR
description:
Augmented Reality (AR) heart

Use the broken heart icon to choose healthy or un-healthy and project the image onto your friends and family‚Ä¶ Go-on, share your heart with someone today!

To use in target (AR) mode:

- Print, cut and hold the *target to your chest
- See your heart come to life in amazing detail
- Capture the experience with the in-built camera
- Post using the automated share facilities

To use in information (3D) mode:

- One finger swipe to rotate
- Two finger pinch to zoom

* Target can be downloaded from:
http://www.bloc-digital.com/downloads/target-heart.pdf

title: FITIV Pulse: Heart Rate Monitor + Workout Tracker
description:
FITIV Pulse is an all-in-one fitness solution designed to help keep you motivated,
engaged and informed during your fitness journey. FITIV uses clear heart rate
graphing and custom in-workout visuals to help you train for the results you want.




FITIV Pulse now supports GPS tracking and Strava integration! Record your runs or bike rides with your favourite smartwatch or Bluetooth heart rate monitor and upload those workouts directly to Strava.




Whether you‚Äôre training for an event or are just trying to take the next step in your fitness journey FITIV Pulse gives you the tools you need to succeed. FITIV gives you everything from heart rate zone training tools to GPS route mapping to help you unlock your fitness.




What can FITIV Pulse do for you?
Track your heart rate, calories, gps route and more
Customize your metrics for a tailored in-workout experience
Visualize your workout intensity in easy-to-use heart rate graphs
Display and save your health and fitness data
Control your music during your workouts
Calculate your maximum heart rate, average heart rate, calories burned, speed, distance and more
Connect you with athletes around the world with the FITIV Community
Integrate with apps like Strava and Google Fit to sync your data seamlessly


Whether you're looking for an app to record your running, cycling, Crossfit, HIIT,
weight lifting or anything else, FITIV Pulse is the app for you. With dozens of
workout types available and the option to add your own workout types
you will always be able to find the workout type that suits your training style.




Compatible heart rate monitors:
Samsung Galaxy Watch
Samsung Gear S3, Samsung Gear Active
Ticwatch
Fossil Sport
Casio PRO TREK
Other Android and Samsung smartwatches
Scosche Rhythm+
Polar H10, Polar H7, Polar OH1
Wahoo Tickr, Wahoo Tickr X, Wahoo Tickr Fit
Orange Theory Fitness (OT Beat Flex, OT Beat Core, OT Beat Burn)
Any other Bluetooth heart rate monitor


Keep your health data synced across platforms with seamless Google Fit integration and get
credit for your workouts wherever that credit is due.
Earn Move Minutes and Heart Points with FITIV Pulse and Google Fit!
Track OTF and other fitness classes!




It can be difficult to get the context you need to know if your training is working.
FITIV Pulse specializes in giving you clear, accurate, and understandable workout
visuals. Heart rate graphing lets you see your intensity, effort, and
improvements over time.




Heart rate zone training is the fitness industry‚Äôs best workout tracking tool. Get the most
accurate calorie burn calculations and details about your workouts!


Joining FITIV‚Äôs Community unlocks a network of athletes worldwide.




Whether you‚Äôre looking to connect with your Strava peers or find new workout buddies the FITIV Community unlocks workout groups, challenges, and a whole new way to meet and compete with athletes around the world.




FITIV Pulse has all of the features you need to up your workout game. Create a
custom in-workout experience, display only the things you care about. No need to
juggle multiple workout apps, FITIV Pulse has everything you need to succeed.




Got questions? Need workout tips? Check out the FITIV Community on Facebook
to learn more about how FITIV Pulse is helping people around the world lose
weight, feel great and train for amazing fitness events.




Check us out here:
FITIV Website
Facebook Page
Instagram

recentChanges:
Badges are finally live on Android!
- Monthly badges for points and workouts are added to give you that extra push to stay on track
- Milestone badges are here for you to set goals for the future
- We also added challenge badges to reward those that like a little extra competition :)
